column3: Head of Content
column11: Leading Internet and Television Provider in Switzerland Classic streaming back in the day to now a full fledged Telco provider paired with modern innovation and classy product development A very successful and future growth oriented company This company is looking to hire an experienced Head of Content For this position you have An interest in the world of TV film Fluency in GermanCan present complex issues in an understandable mannerKnowledgeable in various social media platforms and networksGood leadership and management skillsGood organizational and time management skillsYou count setting priorities among your strengths Your tasks are Technical and disciplinary management of the content team for the companyElaboration and design of content strategies that pursue short and long term goalsMonitoring of the editorial processesManagement of the content across all platformsWriting editing and proofreading of contentConception and elaboration of TV themed worlds Creation evaluation and co definition of KPIs and reportsInternal external interface in the area of contentTracking current trends for inspiration and developing ideas The perks Flat hierarchiesA modern and dynamic working environmentAwesome office space that is on the lakeIn house chefCreative freedomHigh level of responsibilityWarm team environment Please get in touch asap to discuss further laura cannon darwinrecruitment com Darwin Recruitment AG is a Zurich based SECO licensed privately owned subsidiary of Darwin Professional Staffing Group Ltd a Global IT Recruitment Consultancy Darwin Recruitment AG manages client relationships whilst also utilising Darwin Professional Staffing Group databases and networks to source Candidates and fulfil client requests We do not ask for a placement fee from Candidates Employees

column3: Marketing Affiliate Manager DE
column11: Job Description Summary Rakuten DE is a newly launched Point back Platform operating in the DACH region The platform allows users to shop through affiliate partners earning points on purchases made to be redeemed with sister companies in the Rakuten ecosystem together with direct exchange for shop credit at major DE retailors To further develop our business on DE we are looking for a driven Marketing Affiliate Manager DE to scale affiliate partner acquisition and execute wider marketing activities for the region Key Responsibilities Plan and manage weekly content operations for the Rakuten DE platform including coordination of seasonal advertiser and product highlights Work closely with key stakeholders for the Rakuten DE Affiliate Business including European Product and Design teams Create and develop content marketing programmes and strategies to drive the brand customer loyalty retention and cross use Ensure deployment of campaign creatives in time and quality Act as point of contact for Rakuten DE affiliate partnerships including negotiation of commission rate increases and joint campaigns Work closely with in house analysts to understand and report on campaign performance and opportunities for driving growth Act as key DE liaison with other departments and their stakeholders Identify implement and manage new innovations to facilitate growth MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS Knowledge Skills Abilities To perform this job successfully an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge skill and or ability required Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions Minimum 2 years of experience in account management online marketing project management Qualification Requirements Bachelor s degree in marketing or comparable experience Native German speaking and Business proficient English skills required

column3: Senior Marketing Manager
column11: We re an ambitious team building the future of visual content collaboration So here s the scoop Collato is a collaboration platform where creatives and marketing teams align on visual work from draft to done It s designed to be fun and easy for everyone involved No more email ping pong endless commenting threads Dropbox access requests or tedious Zoom meetings Collato makes teams more productive keeping communication workflows and assets in one place For better transparency and collaboration that feels as joyful as gelato The positionWe re ambitious and have big growth plans so we re expanding our marketing team and are keen to have a growth obsessed marketing manager who not only understands traditional marketing methods but also has the ability to think outside of the box to bring new ideas to the marketing mix plus has experience with B2B SaaS products This role will work closely with Head of Marketing to develop new lead acquisition channels and be supported by product design and marketing to find success Tasks will includePlay a central role in the public launch of Collato and help create initial launch buzzWork with the head of marketing to develop a full funnel strategy to reach Collato s target audiences across multiple verticalsDevelop and own partnership influencer marketing plus develop creative campaigns that will stand out across external platformsCollaborate with the content and product teams to leverage product growth techniquesParticipate in events and meet ups to interact with our audience on a personal levelContinuously develop test and optimize campaignsBe happy crunching the numbers to track conversions and campaign success via marketing analytic tools What we re looking forAt least 3 years experience in a B2B marketing role ideally for a SaaS companyFamiliarity with B2B marketing sales funnels and how to nurture leadsA growth hacking mindsetYou should have a good understanding of Google Analytics and have experience in conversion tracking setup via Google Tag ManagerExperience with Hubspot is a plusHappy to write content or create simple video contentExcellent English speaking and writing skillsYou take ownership and feel responsible for growth channels What we offerShape the future of collaboration Yes you Help us grow the best collaboration tool for creatives availableJoin a diverse team 12 people from 10 nationalities Almost half half ratio of male and female collaborators Alpaca lovers to fitness freaks Work your preferred way We don t track hours office time or days off Balance is key That s our secret sauce for great work Compelling package You will get shares in our company as well as an attractive compensation Team activities Ever heard of a workation No Imagine a week in a sunny place where we rent a house work eat and celebrate together Team culture Read more about our story our values the team https collato com about usOwnership impact Drive your own projects forward make a difference to countless teams working on visual content together

column3: Social Media Team Lead
column11: We re Getir the pioneers of super fast delivery Our story can be divided into three elements building an awesome people organization that drives this epic machine making 10 minute grocery delivery possible by figuring out all of its intricacies and scaling that business by getting people to embrace us The story of Getir dates back six years when it first launched in Istanbul After becoming the clear cut market leader in our first market we decided the global push was the next step We recently launched in London Amsterdam Paris and Berlin Innovative Marketing and Social Media complemented with data driven growth mechanisms is not just a necessity for winning While we have amassed numerous best practices throughout our years we also recognize that unique markets merit unique strategies We re in Berlin both to bring our own techniques but also to adapt and learn new ways that result in winning Localising our brand our marketing and of course our Social Media strategies While we want to win locally we also keep our DNA fast somewhat quirky and always authentic With this collective push into international expansion the story of Getir enters its second chapter A chapter in which localized communication is crucial so that we can quickly become local success stories In that light we re looking for a high energy Social Media Team Lead to join our growing Communications Team based in Berlin What You ll Do At Getir Lead a diverse and empowered team Our people are smart and ambitious and they need you to empower and grow them on a professional level We expect you to be a boss people want to work for and know how to get things done both on your own and with your team Manage things through Can you challenge your team to bring the next big idea to Getir Brilliant that s what we are looking for Our next big Social Campaign doesn t need to come from a months long process with multiple stakeholders We re big fans of quickly developing campaigns testing out and getting them to go live Beyond long term strategies always be ready to leverage opportunities in Social and Communications Speed is our currency here at Getir We decide quickly often launching Social Media Campaigns in a fraction of the time compared to other bigger organisations Be ready to push the envelope and experience speed and urgency that you re unlikely to have seen anywhere else Challenge both yourself and the organization you ll be a part of as you face certain challenges throughout your career at Getir We re not a perfect organization but we ll always be honest and genuine as we strive to do the right thing Own our Social Media Channels Take great pride and be diligent in being both a caretaker of the Channels as well as the representative voice Set up and oversee processes that enable the 24 7 responsible management of our Social Media Channels No tweeting from happy hours though Work to create Content and responses that are genuine responses that you would want to hear as a user yourself Push back against corporate sayings if and when they are suggested Do your very best to protect and further develop the Getir tone Collaborate with the Marketing Team in the development and distribution of Content relevant for Social Media Push back if you don t think that it s relevant Adapt and develop new Strategies for our Social Media The present is always temporary Let your team create Empower your team to create but also be ready to get your hands dirty We believe your team will only respect you if they know you can do it too and they can learn from you Develop and present insights about where Social Media is going Should we be Clubhouse or TikTok Should we continue as is We don t want to be the 37th company to take up New Trend X so we often pass on those Get us in at the early stages Start New Trend Y if possible Requirements German on native or near native level is a must An absolute minimum of 8 years of working experiences are required Minimum of 4 years in Social Media Advanced fluency in English is a must Allowed to work in Germany existing working permit is a must Solid Project Management experience is a must You will be a leader but you will also be getting your hands dirty First leadership experience Servant Leadership style Empower others let people work to their strength protect your team Be the leader you wish you had in your first job Ideally experience in one of the following fields FMCG Trade Start Scale up or Agency Extensive experience within Social Media incl KPI tracking and delivering Campaigns Life and career related insights into the German customers audience An extensive network within the Social Media Industry The less intermediaries we need to get something done the better A solid network with agencies with an eye for SoMe Brand communication is ideal A bias towards action If possible get it done If not reasonably push the subjective and imaginary boundaries to make it possible Work with Social Media Creative Agencies but also with the production companies and our in house agency that turns strategy into media content We re pretty hands on Have fun while doing all of this Work should ultimately be fun

column3: Campaign Manager
column11: Campaign Manager m f d Fulltime Berlin What we doItsapark is a sustainably driven marketplace With circular services and products we cover fashion beauty and living for women who re seeking more vibes less rules more style less trends more keep less waste basically better choices for themselves and our planet We re now looking for an Campaign Manager for a maternity cover position for 9 months In this role you ll report directly to the Head of Content About usOur Berlin space hosts a motley crew of talented people spanning over 15 nationalities and abundant expertise from lifestyle editors sustainability experts and tech developers to brand and curation specialists and digital experience wizards We re all bound by a pioneering mentality a drive towards sustainability and style and an appreciation for a change driven working environment that continually evolves with our test learn adapt way of working Intro to the roleAs the Campaign Manager you ll be responsible for leading the content creation for Marketing You ll work cross functionally with the Content team Commercial team and Marketing team to plan drive and deliver all assets needed for our marketing activities on a daily basis You will also be responsible for creating content for larger 360 campaign touchdowns in the Marketing calendar You will work closely with our Creative Director and content team to develop campaign concepts and then execute and deliver those campaigns to serve our campaign goals from building awareness and love for the brand but also lower down the funnel in consider and convert For this role it is essential to have a communication skillset a customer centric mindset and strong culture fit with our team inspired by sustainably driven style and passionate about driving change What are your Responsibilities 1 ongoing marketing Brief the content team and commercial team on all marketing activities asset needs and testing scenarios Manage the marketing content creation process from creating the briefs managing timelines and giving input on copy and ad design and landing pages to final delivery of all assets to our Performance Marketing Manager Lead regular reviews of assets and activities with the content team to continually learn and optimize our marketing content Ensure that the brand and identity is adhered to in the communication Create easy to use tools for the team to work cross functionally What are your responsibilities 2 bigger campaign touchdowns Work with our Marketing Manager and content team to develop and execute larger 360 campaign concept to make bigger touchdowns in the marketing calendar Work cross functionally and alongside our Production manager to manage external agencies and freelancers to execute and deliver on campaign needs according to the timelines goals KPI s and budgets defined About youYou have a marketing background with a commercial mindset and good understanding of effective communication across the marketing funnel You are creatively minded and are open to trying fresh ways of doing things You take the initiative to get the job done you don t need traditional structures or need to wait until you are directed to take action you see a problem or a gap and you move to solve it You are highly organized with the ability to work across multiple projects and prioritize multiple deadlines You are a people person You enjoy working in a team environment and like to be talking directly to lots of different stakeholders every day You enjoy your work and bring positive vibes and good energy What we offer Learn grow and change quickly on the job and with us through workshops training regular peer to peer feedback and our online development portal Maintain that work life balance with 30 days of holiday possibility to work from home Working remote is up for discussion as is your laptop H M Group wide discount card for Germany based FTE s Weekday Arket Monki Cos other Stories H M Home Swapfiets bike subscription GER to offer you a more sustainable commute to work Weekly fresh fruit baskets in the office Weekly sustainability sessions Monthly I D session Newsletter This year we offer a posture and mindfulness workshop Where we meetOur two unique Berlin spaces the Gallery and the Villa are designed to bring people and communities together who are leading change big or small to host everything from roundtables and clothing swaps to workshops and special events We also happen to work here when we re not meeting online from our temporary home office Inclusion Diversity For us this means acknowledging variety in everything from race and gender to identity and profession level and actively engaging in a diversified environment Encouraging contrasting perspectives inspires relevancy and provides a powerful tool to address the challenges we face Inclusion is diversity in action and diversity is fundamental Sustainability At the core of what we do is inspiring better buys As a multi brand platform for fashion and lifestyle we encourage our users to click what they love read what they want and only buy what they need This goes hand in hand with sustainability and our research into brands and passion for finding the very best products reflects this In our spaces we have an inherent drive and an unfolding commitment to circular working We hope you do too

column3: Senior SEO Manager d f m
column11: Your challenge As our Senior SEO Manager within the Content Team you ll have the opportunity to help shape the future of SEO strategy at Taxfix Reporting to our Content Lead and collaborating with stakeholders across the organisation you ll implement your vision to drive organic growth and help bring Taxfix and tax filing empowerment to the masses Your responsibilities Full ownership of the SEO channel s strategy and execution Work with content lead to develop SEO targets and report on progress to key cross functional stakeholders Drive growth through SEO content working with internal teams in local markets to optimise keyword performance Conduct keyword research to define high potential video content and optimise YouTube SEO performance and Google video visibility Monitor and improve domain authority via link marketing activities working with agencies in our various markets Work closely with engineering to monitor and improve our site speed and website architecture Work closely with engineering and analytics teams to automate SEO content production processes wherever possible Your profile 3 5 years of experience with SEO and content marketing in a high growth environment Experience with the full range of SEO disciplines from on page and technical SEO to off page SEO Experience with SEO tools Analytics Search Console Searchmetrics Sistrix Ahrefs Screaming Frog etc Experience working with stakeholders and agencies to achieve your goals and objectives Experience working with product and engineering to define and scope complex technical projects like page speed improvements Experience with YouTube SEO is considered a plus Fluent in English with a basic understanding of German Knowledge of French and Italian is considered a plus Why Taxfix A chance to do meaningful people centric work with an international team of passionate professionals Holistic wellbeing with free mental health coaching sessions yoga and a discounted membership to Urban Sports Club A monthly allowance to spend on home support services including childcare housekeeping pet sitting tutoring and elderly care Employee stock options for all employees because everyone deserves to benefit from the success they help to create Dedicated relocation and visa support for those that need it Choose to work from home or our modern office when needed plus healthy drinks and snacks when you do come in 27 annual vacation days and flexible working hours Full trust to take ownership of your work in a flat hierarchy where feedback is encouraged and expected A generous learning budget to support your personal and professional development and guidance from our internal L D experts Work from abroad for up to one month every year Just align with your team and then enjoy your trip Plenty of opportunities to socialise as a team In addition to internal meetups our international team hosts regular get togethers virtually and in person when possible Free tax declaration filing of course through the Taxfix app and internal support for all personal tax related questions Have a four legged friend in your life We re happy to have dogs join us in the office About us Every year millions of people are either filing their taxes in fear or giving up on their tax refund altogether We re working on fixing that Our intuitive app enables anyone regardless of education or background to file their taxes with newfound confidence Spread across Berlin and Madrid Team Taxfix is a compassionate group of solution finders We speak our minds openly and with 300 professionals from 45 different nationalities we re rich in ideas and voices In four years we ve raised over 100 million euros in funding and helped people reclaim more than 900 million euros

column3: B2B Marketing Manager m f x
column11: Your role As B2B Marketing Manager m f x you are responsible to ramp up LemonOne s sustainable Inbound Sales Channel As part of our Growth Team you will work closely with the New Business as well as Sales Operations Strategy Teams Your job You develop our B2B content strategy as well as a communication strategy for the given target groups markets to strengthen and expand our B2B partnerships You design organize and manage campaigns with our Sales Team You write industry specific content blog newsletter website PR texts e mailing ppt presentations You are responsible to increase brand awareness improve marketing efforts and boost sales You perform qualitative and quantitative campaign analyses to inform your decisions and share trends insights and growth opportunities with the team and relevant stakeholders You inspire Ideal Customer Profiles ICPs of LemonOne You create communication packages for our ICPs from basic to customized packages for key accounts Your profile You have 3 years of experience in B2B Marketing Communications with a strong international background in SaaS or at a forward thinking technology firm You have deep expertise in all things digital email marketing social media paid ads SEO third party content syndication You have a broad technical background due to your expertise in performance marketing and tracking analytics You have an entrepreneurial mindset want to get things done and can juggle many tasks at once You have excellent communication skills in German and English both written and verbal Plus You speak French Spanish or Italian Plus You have a basic understanding of lead generation opportunities Why LemonOne A lively and open company culture with flat hierarchies A dynamic and fast paced environment where you have an impact from day one A high degree of creative freedom and responsibility with great career opportunities Individual focus on professional development that follows clear career paths Flexible working hours Central location with a sunny terrace and a nice view over Berlin Gym equipment for your daily workout to stay active Huge get together post Covid 19 party planned About LemonOne We are a dynamic highly motivated and multicultural team that loves to challenge the status quo Being a huge fan of face to face communication we love working together in our office space in Berlin We also enjoy each other s company at after work get togethers while sitting on our sunny terrace with an amazing view of the Berlin TV Tower During this current situation however we are having a good time during virtual meetings and online team events LemonOne was founded in 2017 with its mission to enable all people to make better purchase decisions through great visual content Our fast growing B2B platform connects photographers and companies intelligently across Europe to provide optimized visual content Our focus lies especially in the travel real estate and food industry In the next step our B2B platform will serve as an AI enabled infrastructure to host photos and videos for companies To show everyone the visuals they want to see we give our photographers the opportunity to concentrate on what they do best while our editing team takes great care of the high end editing in the next step Delivering customized and ready to use visual content efficiently allows our customers to focus on their core business and in the meantime boost their conversion rates Learn more at Your application At LemonOne we believe in growing with people like you proactive forward thinkers who want to create actual impact with what they are doing Will you be one of them If so we are looking forward to your application simply with your CV via the button below

column3: Director Brand
column11: GitLab s DevOps platform empowers 100 000 organizations to deliver software faster and more efficiently We are one of the world s largest all remote companies with 1 400 team members and values that guide a culture where people embrace the belief that everyone can contribute This role is a leader on the corporate marketing team who will provide vision for a team of creatives that are inspired to take GitLab to the next level This role will set the GitLab brand vision and work to execute the strategy across various mediums The Director Brand reports to the VP Corporate Marketing and oversees the design brand growth and corporate events teams Job Grade The Director Brand is a grade 10 Responsibilities Develop and oversee brand strategy to increase awareness of GitLab the brand as well as the product across the globe Bring the GitLab brand to life through one of a kind brand campaigns and creative brand concepts that target our business and developer audiences Recruit top talent to build a world class brand and creative team to take GitLab to the next level as a company Work with the team to provide vision and strategy around brand campaigns to execute them in a results and metrics driven fashion Manage joint marketing opportunities with customers and partners to drive GitLab s brand narrative Bring on and manage creative agencies around the world ensuring activities are aligned to the strategy Oversee the creative brand growth and corporate events team to align with overall brand objectives and messaging Oversee resources to ensure key activities are activated with the right budget at the right time in line with the GitLab brand Ability to think outside of the box and challenge the team to push the boundaries Requirements 15 years of experience working as a brand leader in B2B technology space Passion for creativity innovation and making complex topics and systems accessible and understandable A data driven mindset with the ability to convert quantitative qualitative research into actionable insights Experience in coaching developing and mentoring employees Excellent program management skill set able to identify work streams plan rollouts and execute Background in building brands inclusive of audiences that span wide functions and geographies Experience building and scaling processes teams budgets tools and programs Ability to work cross functionally with product creatives product marketers content marketers and campaign managers of all levels Performance Indicators Sets brand goals and objectives for the organization Increases overall brand awareness through various channels and campaigns Builds and recruits a world class brand team Hiring process Candidates for these positions can expect the hiring process to follow the order below Please keep in mind that candidates can be declined from the position at any stage of the process To learn more about someone who may be conducting the interview find their job title on our team page Qualified candidates will be invited to schedule a 30 minute screening call with one of our Global RecruitersNext candidates will be invited to schedule a first interview with the Hiring ManagerNext candidates will be invited to interview with 2 5 team membersThere may be a final executive interview Additional details about our process can be found on our hiring page Compensation To view the full job description and its compensation calculator view our handbook The compensation calculator can be found towards the bottom of the page Additional details about our process can be found on our hiring page Remote Global Country Hiring Guidelines GitLab hires new team members in countries around the world All of our roles are remote however some roles may carry specific location based eligibility requirements Our Talent Acquisition team can help answer any questions about location after starting the recruiting process Your Privacy For information about our privacy practices in the recruitment process please visit our Recruitment Privacy Policy page

column3: Digital Marketing Growth Manager m w x
column11: Puls Project is at the verge of an exhilarating journey Our mission is to create the entire financial world in one platform for German small to midsize enterprises and entrepreneurs across all sectors and industries We are building a platform that will enable the client to have money where the client needs it just at the right time when they actually need it The aim is to free up their time to make sure it can be spent on growing their business not just managing to survive Puls connects all your bank accounts in one place business as well as private The user will be able to have an overview of their financial history as well as actually get forecasting for their cash flow with that data You will be able to make all payments in one place instant and easy And what if money gets tight The future with Puls will give the opportunity to get business loans for SME without the hassle of a complicated bank checkup At Puls Technologies GmbH you can expect a high caliber work environment without the boring corporate style processes You work directly with the founders an energetic team that is highly motivated to create impact in the world of SMEs As Digital Marketing Growth manager m w x you have the unrepeatable and one and only opportunity to promote the growth of our young company by implementing outstanding successful growth strategies and measures actions Aufgaben What we want you to do Designing and implementing growth strategies using all known marketing channels focusing on performance marketingDefinition validation and monitoring of KPIsAcquisition qualification of prospective customersCreating and implementing a successful sales pipeline by talking to customers understanding their needs and obtaining customer feedbackParticipation in creation of landing pages Creatives and much moreOptimisation of the different marketing channels to improve conversion rates and acquisition costs in addition to the acquisition of higher quality trafficsBuilding a team of outstanding growth marketers customer consultants and account managers Qualifikation What we need 3 years experience in the active acquisition of users for a digital startup and or the scaling and commitment of users in a mature digital companyBroad knowledge of the digital environment UX omni channel marketing Analytics conversion optimisation storytelling copywriting performance marketing email marketing sales lead generation retention A B testing image editing Wordpress Technical understanding and accustomed dealing with different tools for a wide use as Growth MarketerFocus on the entire customer journey from awareness to retentionFluent in German due to our DACH region customersFluent in English as we have an English speaking company culturePassion for building and scaling digital products and servicesEntrepreneurial mindset with a hands on mentalityHigh level of independence finding creative solutions and result orientationData driven work style and reasoning Benefits What can we offer An incredibly talented team of bright international individuals always ready to learn discover and implement An environment with the room to grow on a personal and professional levelA centrally located office in Berlin City WestTo be part of a fearless pioneer company in the relentless pursuit of new technological breakthroughs The opportunity to collaborate with smart and passionate people in building awesome productsChallenging projects Competitive salary Exceptional experiences You will work with an enthusiastic team of smart talented people in the heart of Berlin City West

column3: Head of Marketing Italy m f d
column11: DESTINATION FOR GREAT TALENT At Trade Republic we are on a mission to democratize wealth We set up millions of Europeans for wealth with fast easy and free access to capital markets With over one million customers we are one of the largest savings platforms in Europe with users holding over 6 billion on our platform We are seen as the go to destination for top talent from across the globe Everyday we strive to make Trade Republic a great environment to do the best work of your life surrounded by exceptional caring and passionate colleagues In addition to learning and growing with a world class team you will build a destination for everyone across Europe to put money to work About The Team Marketeers effectively spread the word In the Marketing Team we shape a brand that stands for the democratization of wealth We raise awareness for our mission by bringing the best creative talents together with the most data driven marketeers We are the face to our growth What You ll Be Doing Be part of our leadership team in Italy and report directly into our global CMO closely collaborating with our Country ManagerLead our local Marketing team and build Trade Republic to a strong brand within ItalyManage the strategy budget and execution of our local Marketing initiatives with a strong focus on product marketing partnerships community building and public relations Overlook our local product marketing campaigns around product launches as well as existing products ensuring European wide brand consistencyBuild and expand our network of non financial influencers and establish Trade Republic s influencer partnerships as strong pillar in our marketing mixRealize our European wide mission of making investing culturally relevant from a brand and community steering pointOwn the performance of all local organic social media platforms e g Facebook Instagram LinkedIn TikTok and Twitter and create engaging social media concepts and narratives that convince grow and retain our community members from various experience levels from newbie to expert investorContinuously secure relevant media coverage for new and existing products and measurably expand our standing and brand awarenessClosely monitor and analyze the performance of our marketing campaigns and demonstrate leadership on market opportunities and customers expectationsBase your strategy and campaigns on consumer insights collaborating closely with our central market research teamEstablish efficient work flows within the marketing team such as Growth and our Creative Studio as well as cross functionally with our Product and Data teamLead and develop a team of 4 talented Brand Managers on all levels and build the team further as we grow What We re Looking For You have gained 7 years of relevant experience in a high growth strongly brand focused environment either in another top tier startup a leading brand advertising agency and or top tier consultancyYou are highly analytical creative and quickly understand the big picture while keeping an eye for detail to ensure flawless qualityYou are excited by our mission to democratize access to capital markets and are keen to position Trade Republic as THE brand that makes investing easy and accessible for everyone in Europe we don t expect you to be an expert in financial markets but you should be keen to learn and truly understand our products to innovatively market them You have proven to be a great leader already having led a team of 5 direct reports and enjoy building and developing teamsYou are experienced in delivering results under tight timelines and bringing large cross functional marketing campaigns to marketYou bring excellent prioritization organizational and problem solving skillsYou are execution focused as a great collaborator you never stop pushing towards clarity and deliveryYou are hungry to grow and excel in one of the fastest paced and successful start ups in Europe working together with top talents across the globe WHY YOU SHOULD APPLY NOW At Trade Republic you will get to do the best work of your career We are a destination for people who are exceptional at what they do Every day we strive to build a world class team and provide the space for people to do their best We have a relentless ambition of raising the bar and expect the best from ourselves Through our dedicated people first management approach and transparent career paths you will have the opportunity to develop and grow your career like never before And because you are surrounded by a diverse team of high performers you will be learning every day You will play an important role in fixing one of the largest challenges we face closing the pension gap and democratizing wealth Trade Republic is a place where your job your career and your passions intersect If this gets you fired up just like it does for all of us at Trade Republic then reach out Trade Republic embraces diversity and equal opportunity in a serious way We are committed to building a team that represents a variety of backgrounds perspectives and skills The more inclusive we are the better our work will be

column3: European Marketing Manager f m d
column11: The Lovehoney Group is one of the world s leading companies in the sex toy market We re proud to promote sexual happiness and empowerment through design innovation research development and great customer service After an exciting 2021 merger bringing together Lovehoney Amorana and WOW Tech we re stronger than ever in our mission to destigmatize sexuality and help more people to enjoy a fulfilling love life Our award winning globally recognized brands include Fifty Shades of Grey Happy Rabbit Womanizer and We Vibe With over 700 employees spread over our HQs in Bath and Berlin and offices all over the world the Lovehoney Group is a market leader in the pleasure industry Tasks Responsible for the European marketing strategy and budget as well as execution and implementation of the marketing activities to support and deliver business objectives Lead the regional marketing team in strongly promoting our brandsEnsure the proper localization and implementation of global programs and campaignsMeasure analyze and report the impact and results of regional marketing programs to stakeholders and the executive teamEstablish regional trade marketing campaign to support the success of the sales teamEvaluate European marketing events and carry out effective exhibitions and eventsReinforce brand and product messaging in various situations and scenariosLead the team to recognize internal and external marketing opportunities and solutionsOverlook product marketing activities such as understanding customer demand and requirements by market segments matching this to product requirementsPresentation of product vision features and functionality to Sales Team and customersEnsure a good cooperation with the product team and a clear communication of our values and USP to customers Requirements 5 years of relevant proven marketing experience for B2C brands ideally with 1 2 years in a leadership roleBachelor s degree in related fieldStrong leader with commercial sense who interprets business facts and challenges and turns them into actionable insightsAbility to well utilize global resources and willing to share good cases to other regionsStrong verbal and written skills in English and German Another European language is a plusGood presentation skills especially in EnglishA strong personality highly motivated with initiative passion and excellent problem solving skills Benefits You will work for a global pleasure brand that is among the fastest growing in its industry You will become part of a highly skilled team of international specialists and interesting people You will be offered a range of personal development opportunities including language courses and career specific training workshops and conference attendance You will profit from a creative knowledge sharing and stimulating environment You will enjoy our light spacious office in the heart of Berlin with all the latest mod cons and refreshments on hand to make working with us comfortable and fun

column3: Performance Marketing Manager m f d
column11: EqualTo is a well funded seed stage b2b software company based in Germany We build transparent sales commission software Our team consists of experienced SaaS entrepreneurs engineers and UX designers with big ambitions We have done a complete rethink of how one should manage sales commissions resulting in a uniquely positioned product the first truly transparent no code commission platform combining the flexibility of spreadsheets with the scalability of SaaS We currently all work remote with a remote first future and a first office planned in Berlin in 2021 OUR MISSION Incentive compensation should do one thing motivate people But in countless companies it s a source of frustration disputes and tedious admin We are on a mission to make sales commissions transparent easy and most importantly motivating The role We are looking for a passionate and creative Performance Marketing Manager to join our growing team and fuel EqualTo s sales pipeline Performance Marketing is a highly strategic function at EqualTo where you ll collaborate on go to market across Product Sales and Marketing The ideal candidate is an experienced performance marketer with a passion for understanding how and why prospects are attracted to a product What you would do Focus on GTM priorities to drive defining instrumenting measuring and executing end to end campaigns Partner with digital content field programs and marketing operations to align multi channel execution Develop and lead all integrated campaigns both online and traditional in partnership with the rest of the marketing team Update sales on a regular basis on plans progress of campaigns and upcoming activities Focus on budget efficiencies and improvements Establish goals and KPIs and report back on results to key stakeholders in sales product groups and marketing Recommend new tools to drive and scale campaigns with an emphasis on integrated marketing What we are looking for 5 years B2B product marketing experience with an emphasis on market strategy Comfort working in a startup environment Marketing experience within a SaaS or cloud based technology start up is preferred Proven background in owning customer research market analysis and segmentation Collaborative and team oriented with an ability to build strong working relationships across levels departments and geographically dispersed office locations Demonstrated communication and writing skills About our work culture We are an informal company with a transparent friendly and fast paced work culture It s an inspiring place to work because we are good at what we do and we love doing it In a startup it s all about figuring stuff out fast We re efficient and we respect each other s time When we make mistakes we happily admit them and try to do better next time The best ideas win and we don t waste time on politics Everyone in any role takes ownership of our product and the customer experience and we make it a little bit better every day

column3: Sustainability Marketing Manager f m x
column11: Cozero is a Berlin based ClimateTech startup that transforms every company into a low emission business Our SaaS platform offers a fully digital end to end Carbon Action Platform CAP to track forecast and manage corporate emission data and most effectively match them to low emission solutions on the market to reduce their carbon footprint Based on our platform carbon reduction becomes actionable Become part of a ClimateTech startup empowering companies to master their path to carbon neutrality Together we reduce a major share of global carbon emissions The Sustainability Marketing Manager is a versatile hands on yet strategically minded marketer who will play a central role in shaping the go to market of Cozero This individual will handle all aspects related to marketing with the primary focus to work closely with the sales organization to help accelerate their most important accounts in a productive and effective way Account Based Marketing Other areas include but are not limited to including demand generation product marketing website maintenance events content press branding design partner marketing What will make you successful is having a strong traditional background in B2B SaaS marketing you should have prior account based marketing experience but also exposure and or are eager to expand your experience in other aspects of marketing This role is best suited for individuals who are hands on driven self starting and work collaboratively on cross functional matters Tasks Generate widespread awareness of Cozero and begin to demystify the process getting to net zeroDeploy successful marketing campaigns and own their implementation from ideation to executionManaging marketing growth tracking metrics that influence content strategy etc Advance Cozero in terms of thought leadership by developing articles whitepapers eBooks webinarsExperiment with a variety of organic and paid acquisition channels like content creation content curation pay per click campaigns event management publicity social media lead generation campaigns copywriting performance analysisDevelop marketing assets for sales enablement such as case studies fact sheets etc Fast track Cozero s digital marketing for website email marketing and outreach contentChannel marketing communication insights into the development of our productBuild strategic relationships and partner with key industry players agencies and vendorsStay up to date with the dynamics of the emission management ecosystemCompany building We are just getting started at Cozero and we are looking for folks with a bias to action who can take on many hats and are motivated to build the most amazing things for our customers employees and the general public Requirements You should excel in Demonstrable experience in marketing together with the potential and attitude required to learnUnderstand the needs of companies and how to address them effectivelyBy nature you are decoding complex matters you are thinking communicating with clarity and you are thinking fastHigh capacity for building compelling messagesConfident on the marketing tech stack Cozero should be using and how to run effective demand generation and digital campaigns Strong communication skills both written and verbalFluency in English GermanSound understanding of environmental sustainability challenges for SMEs and multinationals Additional University degree and or substantial experience in the fields of Marketing Communication Journalism or the likeAbility to work structured independently in a fast paced international team environmentBias for taking responsibility bias for action You have a track record of doing whatever it takes to get things done You have accomplished things that others thought were impossible You are ceaselessly creative and impactful Strong professional networks with marketing sustainability practitioners These are not rigid criteria What is more important than your resume we re looking for smart passionate effective people to join Cozero and our purpose If you re interested in our mission we would love to hear your story Benefits Being an elementary part of one of the fastest growing ClimateTech startups in Europe with critical responsibility and influence on our story customer perception and overall venture developmentJoining a dynamic environment that column3: B2B Marketing Manager
column11: At Vaayu we are on a mission to do our part in solving climate change We know e commerce has a big climate impact and we our focussed on helping retailers lower their carbon emissions Calculating carbon can to months to do and is very expensive We want to democratize this by simplifying carbon calculation and making analytics easy for every online retailer We have built Software that is already serving sustainability thought leaders like Armed Angels and Organic Basics We are a remote first company based in Berlin looking to hire great people from all across Europe or equivalent timezones We are looking for team members who love innovating want to work at a purpose driven startup and will collaborate with us in shaping the culture of a growing team as we help make a positive impact on our planet Tasks We are looking for an experienced Marketing Manager to develop our company s marketing strategy This opportunity is perfect for an entrepreneurial minded individual who has a proven track record of formulating and executing digital marketing strategies for B2B software and SaaS products Some things you will do Develop execute and manage marketing strategies that successfully drive top of funnel leads both via inbound and outbound actions Create and optimize targeted campaigns across LinkedIn Programmatic Evaluate the effectiveness of campaigns in achieving their stated objectives including impact on lead generation LTV and retention Build analytics define metrics and track the impact of campaigns along the funnel including pipeline contribution deal acceleration and closed won on Hubspot CRM andBuild a marketing plan and roadmap to constantly improve marketing strategy and communications A nice to have would be knowledge of SEO and Content Marketing Requirements At least 3 years lead generation B2B experience Experience in driving growth using lead generation campaigns search engine optimization SEO paid social and display marketing Expertise in setting up and operating automation and CRM software such as Marketo Google Analytics Hubspot Salesforce etc Proven track record and experience building and leading complex marketing programs and reporting on the results Expert project management skills and highly organized Solid analytical and problem solving skills including metrics driven thinking Works seed stage company The founders have extensive experience in climate retail software engineering and product having worked at companies including Zalando Vimcar Comtravo Topshop Topman Flypay

column3: Junior Digital Marketing Manager Sweden m f d
column11: tink is the expert for selling connected home products and services The company was founded in Berlin in 2016 With our more than 100 employees we set ourself the goal of getting everyone excited about connected homes In doing so we focus not only on marketing the smart hardware but also on all associated services such as consultation installation insurance and rental models In 2018 tink was honored the Tech5 Award as one of the fastest growing startups in Europe and has already been able to win more than 700 000 customers in five countries for its platform The investors behind tink are Rocket Internet Cadence Growth Capital ProSiebenSat 1 and the Swedish energy provider Vattenfall Now we are looking for additional smart and highly motivated employees to grow tink Tasks Are you passionate about marketing products and enjoy seeing the results of your work swiftly while having significant impact within the company Are you highly analytical and enjoy digging into data Digital marketing enables customer feedback in real time which allows you to make more informed decisions on how to approach the consumer on multiple touchpoints within the marketing funnel and thereby grow revenue As a digital marketing manager at tink you will be responsible to unlock Sweden as a market across multiple acquisition channels platforms such as Facebook Google Criteo etc The You are responsible for the planning creation and management of our Swedish paid digital marketing channels social and search engines You optimize campaigns according to best practices and learnings while working on automation and growing the channels according to relevant KPIsYou analyze available data closely monitor your results set up reporting and benchmark continuouslyYou are hands on and enjoy digging deepYou test hypotheses with available data and generate learningsYou work closely with the performance marketing team to solve problems and share your issues and learnings Requirements working in a data driven environmentYou have experience with tools such as Excel metabase and datastudio Ideally you have some experience with SQL R or Python for automation and data analysisYou like to share your ideas and develop concepts to improve processes evaluate test results and generate recommendations for actionYou have an affinity for technology and understand how data driven advertising feed and tracking systems workYou work in a well structured way have a high quality approach and a good eye for details while being able to work in a fast paced environment without losing your coolYou work well independently and can structure and prioritize your workday successfully to maximize output effectivelyYou enjoy sharing knowledge proactively with the team and working in an Sports Club Team Events and the snack bar is always stocked We make sure that you look forward to coming to work every day Interested Then we are excited about receiving your application to be a part of our growing team in Berlin

column3: Author Success Manager
column11: We believe that every author should have an equal chance to succeed Therefore our mission is to discover hidden talents and turn them into globally successful authors This is how we make it happen Inkitt is our self publishing platform where anyone can upload and share their stories for free We analyze our users reading behavior with a unique algorithm to identify potential bestsellers which we then license for our Galatea app When licensed and published on Galatea we enhance the author s vision adding vibrations and sound to turn their stories into immersive experiences for our users Currently our most successful author is Sapir Englard a 24 year old author from Israel who uploaded her story to Inkitt in 2018 her story is selling faster than Harry Potter on Galatea all around the world As an Inkitt Author Success Manager your mission is to manage a large team of authors working as brand ambassadors and ultimately continue building new relationships to help grow the Inkitt platform Outside of working closely with these existing brand ambassadors and influential authors you are directly handling the related administrative and marketing efforts Key ResponsibilitiesYou are the direct contact and manager for all members of the Inkitt brand ambassador program You diligently manage administrative tasks and work closely with the ambassadors to ensure that the program is moving forwardYou manage growth and business development tasks to ensure that the ambassador program continues to grow and build relationships with influential authors You will relations business development or marketing background Experience with various types of marketing including social media affiliate and CRM marketing An outstanding understanding of event planning and organizing You have an experimental mindset with an enthusiasm to test new way to grow authors and readers You should be a confident communicator comfortable with both written and verbal communication You are ideally able to analyze data and work extremely well with spreadsheet applications You are confident when managing multiple groups of various sizes involving a variety of tasks You approach problems logically and with good judgment to ensure the appropriate customer outcome You are able to handle a variety of tasks both creatively and analytically What we offer you All Locations Flat hierarchy in a fast working environment flexible working hours Bi weekly All hands meetings and company updates Discounted membership for Urban Sports Club An unlimited budget for books and unlimited allow you to share and receive feedback anytime everywhere Additional offerings for our talent in Berlin once we re all vaccinated An extremely cozy plant filled and dog friendly office which could not be better located in the heart of Berlin Alexanderplatz Hackescher Markt Regular local team events as well as free fruit coffee tea and dinners in the office Sponsored cross functional lunches and city exploring events Free yoga and HITT training classes in the office several times a week Does this sound like somewhere where you can make a lasting positive impact Then apply now We are looking forward to speaking with you

column3: 0365 Security Engineer f m d
column11: Are you curious about how information security works in an agile company As part of Axel Springer IT we provide a modern and secure IT infrastructure for the Axel Springer group and its more than 300 brands start ups with As a Cyber Security Analyst you will support our teams in further developing our security infrastructure We work according to agile and classic working models and organize operational activities according to ITIL processes As a Cybersecurity Expert for Office 365 you will support our teams in further developing our security infrastructure We work according to agile ITIL and carry out various it IT risk analyses You ve come to the right place if you want to actively shape the future of media with your own ideas and believe that independent journalism in the digital world has an important responsibility and a great future ahead of it Become a Security expert and be responsible for the analysis and optimization of our Office 365 and On prem Security Baseline you secure the platform for intentional third party access Azure API Management you create management reports for your products and services you accompany security audits you actively participate in in house Office 365 security and strategy discussions you check and fix security issues You are a Security expert with in depth expertise in MS Office 365 with a focus on security architecture design migrations management and support you have Office 365 security expertise including in depth knowledge of Azure Active Directory Azure Information Protection Information Rights Management Single Sign On and Multi Factor Authentication you are also familiar with related technologies including Microsoft Enterprise Mobility Security you are confident in dealing with hybrid IT structures MS ADDS AzureAD AzureAD Connect you are ideally certified as a Microsoft Identity and Access Administrator or have equivalent qualifications Benefit from a positive open minded working atmosphere in a highly motivated team exciting tasks and an interesting job in an internationally known and established media companyfree space for your ideas and creative freedom for innovative and sustainable solutionsmany individual further education offers and possibilities to expand your knowledge and skills in theory and practicewe support you in every stage of your life Our partner the PME family service will always be there for yourefreshments are provided fruit milk coffee tea and sofas are freely available you can also use our subsidised restaurants coffee barsyour workstation is equipped with state of the art hardware a Laptop and iPhone are providedflexible working hours and mobile work allows you an ideal work life balancewe keep you secure Axel Springer offers you an attractive company pensionwe offer you a permanent full time position from now on Questions and answers about the application process The most frequently asked questions and their answers can be found on our FAQ page career axelspringer com en faq Your contact person for this position reference number 000100883 is Ipek Aldemir Diversity is an essential part of our corporate culture We are looking forward to receiving all applications regardless of gender nationality ethnic and social origin religion ideology disability age sexual orientation and identity You can find information about the representation for the severely disabled at Axel Springer as well as the contact details here career axelspringer com en ksbv Axel Springer SE is a media and technology company with numerous successful journalistic offerings as well as marketing and classifieds portals We are active in Germany and worldwide in more than 40 countries Together we follow one goal We empower free decisions Because by providing independently researched information Axel Springer enables people to make free decisions for their lives We want to become the world leader both in digital journalism and digital classifieds through accelerated growth We are looking for new colleagues who want to actively shape the future of media with their own ideas And who believe that independent journalism holds both an important responsibility in the digital world and has a bright future

column3: Content Marketer
column11: HiPeople is on a mission to make hiring easier for everyone everywhere You as the Content Marketer will shape create and execute the strategy to get the word out Mission Build the HiPeople brand from its earliest stage Think strategically to shape create and execute your long term vision of HiPeople Note This posting is about our ideal candidate but it s also inspirational to set out what this role will become If you are a 50 fit but feel passionate about this role apply anyway we d love to hear from you This job in one picture What you ll get to do Create strategies to effectively build our content pipeline Understand what channels to use and what narratives best showcase HiPeople while providing meaningful content to our readers Write engaging content people actually want to read We are not pumping out content for the numbers we want meaningful pieces that people come back to keeping HiPeople top of mind thoughtleadersReach out to customers and influencers to conduct in depth interviews understanding the ways in which HiPeople is used in the market and how best to position ourselves Work closely with Marketing Sales and Product to align content strategies with lead generation Use a variety of mediums to maximise reach this could include gated content white papers blogs product updates PR social you think of the rest This role is Calls To Action to use and develop compelling narratives to support them You enjoy meeting and reaching out to new people You will be interviewing customers researching and reaching out to influencers 1573 6343 791 nina hipeople io LinkedIn We proudly believe in the power of diversity and inclusion Diversity of thought fuels our success and you can not achieve that without a diverse team We welcome people from any race orientation gender religion age ethnicity disability identity we value all uniqueness

column3: Senior Director Digital Ops Analytics EMEA
column11: Job Description Senior Director Digital Ops Analytics EMEA On our journey towards becoming a multi billion dollar revenue company we are doubling down our investment in our international markets with a focus on growing our EMEA region As part of this growth we are looking to appoint a Senior Director Digital Ops Analytics EMEA to drive an increased focus on building and leading a digital shared services function within the region You ll lead and manage an EMEA central marketing team to build and execute against a plan that achieves pipeline and bookings goals This role is responsible for performance marketing web development operations and analytics in the region ensuring that our local investment matches our company goals and established objectives for thought leadership demand generation and or pipeline acceleration The leader in this role will partner and collaborate closely with similarly aligned corporate marketing functions and field regional marketing to ensure our teams are across and are aligned to the delivery of joint regional marketing plans What will your responsibilities be Lead and drive the creation of EMEA central marketing plans that feed into field and regional country level marketing plans that deliver on regional pipeline and bookings goals based on global positioning and demand generation strategiesDrive a digital strategy and supporting plan that delivers scalable programs to penetrate and expand opportunities in key Commercial and Enterprise accountsPartner and collaborate with EMEA Marketing Field Regional leader along with sales leadership to determine and address needs and gaps around pipeline building and accelerationPartner with corporate central functions such as web digital operations and analytics to ensure brand website digital marketing and processes in country are creating a positive impact at the local level in terms of brand growth demand and conversionCollaborate with corporate teams to ensure local nuances and needs are included in global programs that are executed within the regionIdentify pan EMEA initiatives in collaboration with EMEA field and regional marketing to provide and compliment scalable programs to country level marketing initiativesBuild strong collaboration and partnership with EMEA field and regional function to ensure we are operating as one team in our representation to local GTM teamsPartner closely with our sales xDR and corporate partnersForecast measure and analyze team performance against goals and help refine improve and then report on impact on pipeline and revenueCreate and refine processes for scalable delivery ensuring operationally we are being efficient as we can as a region this is across the funnel including lead follow upRegularly analyse and undertake audit of processes within the region that are working and identifying where we are gappedTake a holistic view on how we can improve region growth through processes improvements and enhancementsLead processes and templates for planning quarterly business review and other marketing analysis Provide analytical insights to the regional teams to better understand performance and where we can make improvements as a business Lead a high performance team of marketers and ensure they have support from HQ including resources budget and career development to be successful in driving innovative and impactful programs in the region What are we looking for in a candidate Extensive experience in marketing with ideally 8 10 years in B2B field marketing required specific expertise in software and SaaS subscription models strongly preferredTrack record of building and driving successful marketing strategies plans and results while tightly aligned with corporate and regional teamsExperience leading and balancing marketing support for both direct and indirect channels proven track record of executing programs to generate sales funnel and accelerate sales momentumEnterprise and Commercial segment experience Industry marketing experience a mustExtensive people management experience ideally 10 years with strong communication and interpersonal skills the ability to work with diverse personalities and motivate othersSelf starter who is committed to the job and drives empowerment and accountabilityProven organizational skills and ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks events projects and deadlinesHighly motivated individual who thrives in a fast paced team environment and is readily adaptable to changing market and organizational dynamicsStrong web digital analytics and operation skills is a mustExperience in corporate and pan regional role is essentialCommitment to professionalism and collaboration is requiredAdditional language skills an advantage Where is this role based Remote UK Zendesk builds software for better customer relationships It empowers organizations to improve customer engagement and better understand their customers Zendesk products are easy to use and implement They give organizations the flexibility to move quickly focus on innovation and scale with their growth Based in San Francisco Zendesk has operations in the United States Europe Asia Australia and South America Learn more at www zendesk com About Zendesk Champions Of Customer Service Zendesk started the customer experience revolution in 2007 by enabling any business around the world to take their customer service online Today Zendesk is the champion of great service everywhere for everyone and powers billions of conversations connecting more than 100 000 logos with hundreds of millions of customers over telephony chat email messaging social channels communities review sites and help centers Zendesk products are built with love to be loved The company was conceived in Copenhagen Denmark built and grown in California taken public in New York City and today employs more than 4 000 people across the world Learn more at www zendesk com We believe in service Learn more about how we provide support to our local communities with volunteering grants and product donations Zendesk is an equal opportunity employer and we re proud of our ongoing efforts to foster global diversity equity inclusion in the workplace Individuals seeking employment and employees at Zendesk are considered without regard to race color religion national origin age sex gender gender identity gender expression sexual orientation marital status medical condition ancestry disability military or veteran status or any other characteristic protected by applicable law We are an AA EEO Veterans Disabled employer If you are based in the United States and would like more information about your EEO rights under the law please click here Zendesk endeavors to make reasonable accommodations for applicants with disabilities and disabled veterans pursuant to applicable federal and state law If you are an individual with a disability and require a reasonable accommodation to submit this application complete any pre employment testing or otherwise participate in the employee selection process please send an e mail to benefits zendesk com with your specific accommodation request By submitting your application you agree that Zendesk may collect your personal data for recruiting global organization planning and related purposes Zendesk s Candidate Privacy Notice explains what personal information Zendesk may process where Zendesk may process your personal information its purposes for processing your personal information and the rights you can exercise over Zendesk s use of your personal information

column3: Social Media Marketing France Internship m w d
column11: Hanfgeflüster is the best known CBD brand in Germany and an absolute Love Brand We develop and distribute innovative CBD products that help people lead a healthy mindful and balanced lifestyle In an extremely fast growing market we have succeeded in becoming one of the most well known cannabis start ups through innovative social media marketing Our goal is to work together to realise the full potential of the cannabis plant and develop the highest quality products A strong focus on sustainability is particularly important to us We are now conquering the European market with the brand Hemproutine For starting and fostering exciting campaigns with leading influencers we are looking for you Tasks Conceptualize execute and analyze our social media campaignsContinuously adapt the social media strategy in line with performance resultsPlan corporations establish close contacts to leading influencers in France and organize exclusive eventsYou identify and select suitable influencers who fit the profiles and requirements of our customersTake over responsibility for sourcing new channels for HemproutineYou critically analyze the KPIs of completed collaborations give recommendations for actions based on them and create reports Requirements You hold a degree or are in the process in Marketing Economics Business Communication or other related studies or have equivalent professional experienceHigh creativity proactivity and a hands on mentality you enjoy working with other people and being the link to our community as well as part of our influencers from day oneYou have a high sense of responsibility and a desire for independent projectsInterest in health and lifestyle related subjects and latest trends in the French social networksYou speak French on a native level and English fluentlyYou want to revolutionize the European cannabis market with a young dynamic and highly motivated team Benefits In our office in the trendy Kreuzberg neighborhood we place a lot of value on community a flat hierarchy and a dynamic working environmentFlexible working hours and fair paymentBeing part of one of the fastest growing start ups in Germany right from the startRegular individual and team feedback to offer you the best opportunities for further development Looking forward to your application Nous sommes impatients de vous voir

column3: Global Director of Communications
column11: Vinted is Europe s biggest pre loved fashion marketplace with 45 million members in 15 countries We want to make second hand the first choice worldwide A team of over 800 people from Vinted s offices in Vilnius Berlin Prague Amsterdam and Utrecht develop and support our platform We share a unique work culture that s based on aiming high taking ownership co creating caring and growth Vinted is committed to building an inclusive workplace where people from all walks of life feel a sense of belonging We welcome applications from all suitably qualified persons regardless of their race colour national origin citizenship sex gender identity sexual orientation religion beliefs disability or age We truly believe when we can be fully ourselves we work better The Director of the Communications will lead the PR Corporate Comms and Social Media teams As part of the Brand Organisation this role will shape Vinted s global narrative through brand product and corporate storytelling We are looking for someone to help us build the future of the Vinted brand whilst taking the practical and data based approach to decision making that is fundamental to Vinted s success You will report to the Senior Director of Brand and frequently work together with senior stakeholders across the organisation If this sounds interesting we d love to hear from you In This Position You ll Deliver and implement the global consumer PR and social strategy across 15 markets in line with Vinted s business goalsLead a cross functional communications team Consumer PR Corporate Comms Social Media focussed on driving both business and brand KPIsBe accountable for monitoring and protecting Vinted s brand reputation and be the voice of the consumer amongst senior stakeholders across VintedAct as the key media contact for Vinted and be responsible for establishing strong relationships with Tier 1 media in priority markets Take a data driven mindset to building strategy setting targets whilst monitoring and reporting to the business on communications results About You Significant professional experience 10 years in global communications roles preferably in the high growth technology sectorHeld leadership roles covering PR Corporate Comms and Social media A history of delivering commercial and brand KPIs through owned and earned media channels Previous experience in building and maintaining high performing and engaged teamsExcellent cross functional collaboration stakeholder management creativity and project management skills in rapidly changing environmentsExisting relationships with key media and the ability to build new ones quicklyExcellent at communicating in spoken and written EnglishAdvantage French language skills Work Perks Opportunity to join our stock options programmeLearning budget 10 from gross yearly salary 30 working days of holidayMonthly team building eventsA personal budget for shopping on VintedA daily allowance for ordering lunchDog friendly officeRemote workout classesMental and emotional health support from MindleticWork anywhere in the EU for 90 days out of the year We are adopting a hybrid workplace model This means that you ll spend Tuesdays and Wednesdays working from the office and for the remainder of your time you ll be able to choose between either working from home or the office But from now until at least 1st September however we plan to continue working from home The new model will roll out once the pandemic situation is under control and national workplace restrictions are lifted If this sounds interesting you may well be just who we need Please send us your CV or point us to your LinkedIn profile and add a brief cover letter We ll be in touch
