native Dutch speaker fluent English and or German language skills are a huge plusYou live in Germany or are willing to move and have a work authorization now and in the futureYou have exceptional verbal written and visual communication skills and demonstrate negotiation skillsYou have a proactive attitude love to get in contact with influencers and build a close relationship with themYou take responsibility for your projects and are proud of your workYou think in solutions not in problems and have a methodical approachYou are enthusiastic about social media beauty and story development and have a knack for good creative and convincing storytellingYou feel comfortable in a fast moving start up atmosphere where processes are just being developed and goals can change at short noticeNice to have You have your own successful Instagram account with creative content and are in regular contact with your subscribers What We Offer You Fast moving start up atmosphere with flat hierarchies and an office in a central location in BerlinOpportunity to further develop our international company and our productsFlexible working hours partly remote work possible currently in home office Unlimited employment contractFree Urban Sports Club membership M

column3: SEO Manager Italy m f x
column11: When someone says Frog you don t think of a little green animal but instead you re inspired for your next analysis Then you ve found your position 0 We love SEO and have done so since our inception in 2000 Content is Queen King but technical and data challenges also wait for you It s not just with the SEO Team where you can philosophise about pagination but also with the CMO the CEOs and the SEO Tech Team If you re not fazed by large amounts of data and enjoy the challenge of complex tasks then you ve come to the right place About your new roleAs SEO Manager you are responsible for the conception and implementation of SEO projects that improve the idealo SEO performance with focus on our Italian domain idealo it On top of that you are also contributing to our global SEO strategy and roadmap You conduct keyword research and work on keyword cluster analysis which then allows you to set the content strategy together with the ITA content team You work closely with the ITA Management Team and the ITA Country Manager in order to create the overall strategy for idealo it Projects are not limited to the Italian market some of your initiatives extend to all idealo s 6 countries and come to life in cross functional teams Optimisations of our on page structure internal linking landing pages and search engine crawling also belong to your responsibilities You monitor and evaluate SEO performance come up with concepts tests to improve it and manage the projects from start spec to finish QA evaluation Skills RequirementsSEO is your passion and it s backed up by 2 or more years of professional experience You have already gained experience in technical SEO analysis and reporting and have an understanding of ranking factors for Google s algorithm You have SEO tool knowledge Screaming Frog Sistrix Searchmetrics ahrefs Search Console or similar tools You are adept at using Excel and have a keen eye for data Knowledge of SQL and other databases is also advantageous You are fluent in Italian and in English German is a plus not a must Understanding of HTML CSS is a plus Your benefits at idealoMore than 1200 motivated colleagues from 40 nations Welcome to Berlin our new headquarter with its outstanding modern architecture and light flooded offices is located close to the former Berlin Wall in the center of what used to be the heart of Berlin s news and publishers economy Family friendliness based on deep conviction including flexible working hours remote work options and 30 vacation days per year So happy We have been named Germany s best employer in the Internet multimedia sector for the second year in a row Source Focus Business 01 2021 issue dated 19 02 2021 About idealoidealo is a Berlin success story in 2000 we started out with the mission of helping consumers make the best purchasing decisions Right in the heart of Berlin over 1 000 employees from 40 nations are working on the future of online shopping We focussing on agile and self reliant work sustainability and a healthy relationship between work and private life These values are firmly anchored in our corporate culture and an integral part of our corporate philosophy As part of our team you can look forward to freedom an international and inspiring working environment Your ideas are particularly important to us Not only our product portfolio is diverse but also the people who work on it We want you just as you are Origin religion gender sexual orientation or a severely handicapped degree do not play a role Information for applicants with severe disabilities As an applicant with a severe disability you can get advice from our Severely Disabled Representation SBV during the application process idealo continues hiring during the COVID 19 pandemicWe do still hire great talent from around the world Due to the ongoing COVID 19 pandemic we are checking almost every day with the authorities if and how we can relocate talent from EU and non EU countries to work with idealo Please bear in mind that we will take individual decisions in close consultation with the applicant and the authorities LI SH1

Hybrid Cloud Big Data Business Anwendungen und Digital Workplace Der Konzern ist der weltweite Informationstechnologie Partner der Olympischen und Paralympischen Spiele und firmiert unter den Marken Atos Atos Syntel und Unify Atos ist eine SE Societas Europaea und an der Pariser Börse als eine der 40 führenden französischen Aktiengesellschaften CAC40 notiert Das Ziel von Atos ist es die Zukunft der Informationstechnologie mitzugestalten Fachwissen und Services von Atos fördern Wissensentwicklung Bildung sowie Forschung in einer multikulturellen Welt und tragen zu wissenschaftlicher und sich zu entwickeln Weitere Informationen finden Sie unter www atos net Unify ist ein weltweit führendes Unternehmen für Kommunikationssoftware und services und seit Januar 2016 Mitglied der Atos column3: Marketing Manager in
column11: AUCTAs Mission ist es Industrieunternehmen in die Lage zu versetzen das Potenzial Ihrer Daten zu nutzen Wissen und Skills jederzeit und überall vermitteln und teilen zu können Wir sind Enterprise Software Experten die es lieben innovative Produkte mit revolutionärer Technologie zu bauen Mit unseren Investoren APX by Axel Springer Porsche IBB Ventures und großartigen Business Angeln haben wir letztes Jahr unsere Pre Seed Finanzierung abgeschlossen Nun wachsen wir stetig und erweitern unser Team mit dem wir gemeinsam neu definieren wollen wie Unternehmen ihren Mitarbeitern und Kunden Wissen und Skills vermitteln Aufgaben Als AUCTAs nächste r Marketing Manager in hilfst du uns bei folgenden Aufgaben Management von Marketing Kampagnen Verständnis des Kampagnenlebenszyklus Unterstützung bei der Entwicklung und Umsetzung von Marketingkampagnen an der Seite deines Managers Paid Media Management Implementierung und Verwaltung von bezahlten Medien über verschiedene Kanäle insbesondere Google Ads und LinkedIn Analytik Überwachung und Berichterstattung z B Google Analytics und Paid Media Kampagnen Erstellung und Verfassen von Inhalten Verfassen und Erstellen von Inhalten für die Verwendung über verschiedene Kanäle bezahlte verdiente und eigene Website Verwaltung Erstellung von Landing Pages und allgemeine Website Aktualisierungen Community Kundenmanagement Verwalten von Social Media Kanälen Aktualisieren und Pflegen von Daten im CRM Pipedrive Vertriebsunterstützung Sicherstellen dass der Vertrieb über die richtigen Marketingmittel verfügt um den Umsatz zu maximieren E Mail Marketing Erstellen und Verfassen von E Mails für E Mail Marketingkampagnen mit Software wie Mailchimp Qualifikation Du bringst folgende technischen Fähigkeiten mit Google Analytics ExcelVerwaltung von PPC KampagnenKundenbeziehungsmanagement CRM Pipedrive E Mail Marketing z B MailchimpSchreiben von InhaltenGrafikdesign Grundlagen der VideobearbeitungVerwaltung sozialer Medien Außerdem trifft folgendes auf dich zu Du hast optimalerweise bereits 2 3 Jahre Erfahrung in einer B2B Marketingfunktion Du sprichst muttersprachlich Deutsch und hast fließende Kenntnis von Englisch in Wort und Schrift Du hast Erfahrung in der Entwicklung von Marketingkommunikation einschließlich Blogs Social Media Inhalten Erfolgsgeschichten von Kunden und Website Inhalten Du hast Spaß an der Erstellung Verwaltung und Optimierung digitaler Kampagnen oder sogar spezielle Erfahrung mit Google Ads und LinkedIn Paid Media Du beherrschst Google Analytics und Social Media AnalysenDu bringst eine nachgewiesene Erfolgsbilanz bei datengesteuerter Berichterstattung und Optimierung mit Du hast die Fähigkeit mit dem Tagesgeschäft zu jonglieren und gleichzeitig das große Ganze zu sehen Du hast Freude an einem schnelllebigen Umfeld und der Übernahme von Verantwortung vom ersten Tag an Benefits Was du von uns erwarten kannst Enge Zusammenarbeit mit einigen der hellsten Köpfe im Bereich Immersive Tech die jeden Tag die Grenzen des Möglichen verschieben Du wirst einen aktiven Beitrag zum Erfolg eines multinationalen europäischen B2B SaaS Startups in der Frühphase haben Die Möglichkeit in unseren Büros im Herzen von Berlin Mitte Office Space in Madrid zu arbeiten während du aber jederzeit Remote und von überall mit uns arbeiten kannst Steile persönliche Entwicklung und Lernkurve in einer schnelllebigen Startup Umgebung Wir freuen uns sehr auf deine aussagekräftige Bewerbung inkl Lebenslauf ein paar kurzen Worten zu deiner Motivation und dem frühestmöglichen Eintrittstermin Lass uns gemeinsam Lernen so intuitiv und einfach wie möglich gestalten mit AUCTA

column3: SEO Manager
column11: UXCam is the market leader in experience analytics enabling organizations to truly see how users are experiencing their mobile applications Brands such as Delivery Hero Rappi Costa Coffee and Virgin Mobile are already using UXCam to deliver the best digital experiences and drive amazing business results UXCam is loved by teams across Product UX Development and Support helping them create the optimal experience for their users Behind our market leading solution and our success are the people and their smart work driving this hyper growth trajectory If you enjoy challenges meaningful work and an opportunity to develop your career in a tech space ripe for disruption then UXCam is the company you are looking for As our Senior SEO Manager within the Content Team you ll have the opportunity to help shape the future of SEO strategy at UXCam Reporting to our Content Lead and collaborating with stakeholders across the organization you ll implement your vision to drive organic growth and help bring and keep UXCam in front of our target audience on search engines Your responsibilities Take full ownership of our SEO strategy and executionWork with content growth marketing and other teams to develop SEO targets and report on progress to key cross functional stakeholders Drive growth through SEO content working with the content team to optimize keyword performanceDevelop sophisticated ideas to enlarge and develop UXCam s organic search visibility based on keyword competitor and market research and monitor the results after implementationMonitor and improve domain authority via link building activities and identify potential new partner websiteWork closely with the web team to monitor and improve our site speed and website architectureWork closely with the growth marketing lead to automate SEO content production processes wherever possiblePrepare and analyze high quality performance reports containing conversions user behavior ranking development and build a proper action plan based on it Your profile You have at least 2 years of experience in SEO managementYou have experience with the full range of SEO disciplines from on page and technical SEO to off page SEO You have a very good understanding of actual SEO ranking factors techniques and experience with analysis tools like Google Analytics Search Console Sistrix aHrefs or SEMRush ideally you have experience in HTML CSSStrong analytical mindset and the ability to solve problems in a structured way backed by dataExperience working with stakeholders and third parties to achieve your goals and objectives Experience working with web and product teams to define and scope complex technical projects like page speed improvements Experience with YouTube SEO is considered a plus Fluent in English

column3: Brand Project Manager all genders
column11: flaconi is one of the largest online pure player for beauty products in Germany The online shop s extensive portfolio consists of more than 850 international brands and 55 000 products in the categories perfume skin care make up hair care natural cosmetics and accessories The online shop covers from drugstore over organic cosmetics to premium all product segments flaconi was founded in 2011 and today already employs over 450 people at three locations at its headquarters in Berlin Charlottenburg and its logistics centre as well as the flaconi Concept Store in Berlin Mitte The German online shop has won numerous awards and is also represented in Austria and Poland Your role You are responsible for the conception and implementation of various cross media campaigns as well as advertising measures and events to strengthen the flaconi brandFor this purpose you will create claims advertorials and campaign textsYour tasks also include trend and competition analysesThrough regular monitoring you know the status quo of the flaconi brand in the beauty industry and derive actions and measures from thisYou will be responsible for brand projects end to end as project owner from the idea via the conception to the implementation and optimization with internal and external stakeholdersOn the other hand you will support other teams in their projects such as the Campaign Team Trade Marketing Team Private Label Team and the Graphics Department and will have the responisility for the conception and brand impactRequirements At least three years of professional experience in project management branding brand strategy or a comparable fieldExperience in the conception and implementation of branding measuresOrganisational talent with creative ideas and an agile way of working in cross functional teamsFirst contact with the beauty industry and an awareness of trends and competitors Business fluent in German and fluent in EnglishAgency experience is a plusWhat can we offer you Our employees matter to us We offer you a permanent contractEasy going workplace We pay your BVG ticket and we do not have a dresscodeInternational flair We support your relocationEmployee discounts As a flaconi you benefit from generous discounts not only in our Online Shop but also at partner companiesWork Life Balance Flexible working hours and home office options allow you to reconcile work and private lifeflaconi Fitness We take care of your health Through a wide range of sports we help you to stay fitWe take care of you flaconi wants to support you also in times of individual crisis therefore we offer you and your relatives help for your mental health through the Fürstenberg InstituteRecreation and relaxation We offer you 29 days of vacation and the possibility of a paid sabbaticalFamily first Our emergency moms are there for you in out of the ordinary situations and look after your child on site in the officeflaconi Academy Actively shape your own career path and take advantage of our internal and external training opportunitiesDog Policy Dogs are welcome in our officeflaconis know how to party You can look forward to cool team events and company partiesAgile work As part of our cross functional teams you have the opportunity to help shape and advance cross departmental topicsFreedom for innovation You can let your ideas run free at our regular hackathons and get inspiration for your daily business at Tech Talks and Breakfast LecturesThinking about tomorrow together flaconi subsidizes your savings contribution to the company pension scheme with an additional 20 Welcome aboard Not only our onboarding day helps you to orientate yourself in the first time but also your personal buddyFood drinks For us it goes without saying that extras such as drinks and fruits are freeShape our company s success with us and apply now online We look forward to receiving your complete application documents including your earliest starting date Please direct your application to Lea Krumland Team Lead Recruiting

column3: Growth Campaign Specialist SMB
column11: About Toptal Toptal is a global network of top freelance talent in business design and technology that enables companies to scale their teams on demand With 100 million in annual revenue and over 40 year over year growth Toptal is the world s largest fully remote company We take the best elements of virtual teams and combine them with a support structure that encourages innovation social interaction and fun We see no borders move at a fast pace and are never afraid to break the mold Position Description Toptal is looking for a Growth Campaign Specialist to drive and support campaigns that will grow and nurture relationships with prospective and existing SMB clients This newly created position will report to our Senior SMB Growth Manager and will ensure optimal outcomes of paid media and client facing campaigns This is a remote position that can be done from anywhere Due to the remote nature of this role we are unable to provide visa sponsorship Resumes and communication must be submitted in English Responsibilities This person will be responsible for building coordinating and executing client facing campaigns across the assigned scope of channels Your goal will be to identify the best paths to reach out to attract and convert leads This person will manage channels and campaigns and implement iterative improvements while working with the Senior SMB Growth Manager to identify new opportunities In The First Week Expect To Onboard and integrate into Toptal Undergo role specific training including learning about procedures and tools currently used within our Growth team In The First Month Expect To Learn about our existing channels and campaigns for SMB Begin to take over some of the coordination and planning of existing campaigns Work with other internal marketing teams such as Brand Marketing and Sales In The First Three Months Expect To Get fully comfortable with the assigned scope of channels and campaigns Come up with new ideas for campaigns implement and optimize and capture and analyze the results In The First Six Months Expect To Find new ways to optimize our campaigns to achieve better results for SMB Growth Continue launching and testing new campaigns working closely with other team members to assess the impact Establish and maintain a stable lead pipeline from the existing campaigns In The First Year Expect To Fully understand all of SMB Growth activities and be able to contribute to the SMB Growth overall strategy Requirements Minimum 3 years of experience working on digital marketing campaigns driving the campaign ideation content creation and execution Strong experience with email marketing and landing pages as well as implementing A B multivariate testing Strong expertise with marketing automation systems like Hubspot and data analysis tools like Tableau Experience in marketing to technical roles e g engineering teams implementing awareness nurturing or retention strategies Experience with content marketing and campaign measurement and evaluation is preferred Strong analytical skills project management attention to detail proactive and great problem solving skills Outstanding written and verbal communication skills as well as perfect grammar and command of the English language Ability to communicate clearly and constantly with teams via Slack and other collaboration tools You must be a world class individual contributor to thrive at Toptal You will not be here just to tell other people what to do For Toptal Use Only uk europe

column3: Senior Marketing Manager
column11: We are a VC backed stealth start up with the mission to bring online grocery delivery to ethnic communities across the globe Our founding team comes with experience from some of the fastest growing tech companies in Europe as well as strategy consulting Delivery Hero Tier WeFox BCG As we have launched our first operations and are now looking for people who want to shape our product and tech strategy from day 1 Join us to make grocery delivery accessible to everyone We are backed by Atlantic Food Labs and part of its food portfolio network which includes no others than Gorillas Choco or Infarm We are building an outstanding team with skilled members across all domains and backgrounds We focus on building a diverse and inclusive company culture and aim to become a global leader in online grocery retail Join us now as our first Senior Marketing Manager m f x in our office in Berlin Mitte YOUR ROLE As a Senior Marketing Manager m f x you will be an integral part of our go to market phase You will act as the right hand of the founder team and drive key initiatives in operations product finance fundraising and marketing Hence you will get involved in all aspects of building an early stage high growth business You will participate in key strategy meetings and engage directly with investors advisors business partners and most importantly customers Everything you work on in this role will shape the future of a young mission driven company WHY JOIN A unique opportunity to work with an early stage and high growth e commerce business in Europe Spice up your career with our focus on becoming an international market leader there are many chances to grow within the team upwards and sidewaysBecome part of the 150 companies strong portfolio and Atlantic network with inspiring peersA once in a lifetime chance to work in an inspiring and challenging environment culture and develop your commercial skills for the digital future of retailEnjoy an amazing team experience be prepared for the after work beers on the rooftop of our office in the heart of Berlin Your Task Responsibilities You will be our first marketing expert in the team and thus will be a key execute and optimize all relevant performance marketing and analytics tools to continuously evaluate and enhance channel campaign and content performance Conduct market research and competitor analysis to define our target market and to constantly refine our product value proposition Define a clear and inspiring content marketing strategy that builds trust and credibility to facilitate long term customer acquisition YOUR PROFILE You have experience in a leading marketing role in a fast growing DTC food start up You have experience in developing market entry strategies and driving international expansion You have a strong track record of developing optimizing and scaling performance marketing channels like Google Adwords and social media performance marketing You have an column3: Co Founder CMO
column11: It takes courageous people to make this planet a better place Let s make sustainable consumption convenient Join us in shaping the economy of the future a circular economy for customers supported by a circular logistics network Let s build a community which makes collective use out of the goods it already owns by exchanging these goods easily and conveniently within the community Our mission is to enable a product circularity by providing a platform to exchange second hand upcycling products and combine this with packaging and emission free transport services such as pickups and deliveries thereby removing the friction of current alternatives We just launched our MVP in Berlin so we are in the very early stage of building a business and currently looking for motivated talents to join the mission TasksDefine the future of circular economy within communities starting with BerlinDefine build a brand around GreenCircleDraft design and lead the social media marketing campaignsBuild up and moderate a strong community around GreenCircleCome up with engaging and fun initiatives to interact with and strengthen the communityCollect feedback learn from customers and help refine the concept and platformLead strategies and efforts to reach and increase target audience through content and strategic partnershipsSupport help wherever needed as co founders do RequirementsSignificant experience in building brands and driving customer acquisitionPassionate about our planetHas the drive and motivation required to build a company in the field of circular economy from the MVP to a scaled operationsBased in Berlin speaking fluent german englishCan inspire others to join us on the journey BenefitsThe chance to change how our economy works and contribute to making the world a better placeBuilding a company and learn all aspects of running oneShaping the future of GreenCircleBasic compensation equity with upside as the business scalesFully committed and experienced co founders to provide guidance and coaching as requiredTrust and support of your ideas Looking forward to chat to you

column11: Job Description Do you want to be a part of Europe s leading platform for creative experiences and join our mission of connecting people by creating unique and unforgettable experiences Email is one of Realtainments strongest channels and it s currently one of our main methods of building relationships with our customers Next to that we are in the process of building up our overall CRM strategy which will include more channels To continue building our email and to support with developing our general CRM concept we are looking for a CRM Manager This person reports to the Head of CRM and will be part of the central Marketing department Are you looking to Optimize performance through continuous analysis and testing Create implement and report email campaigns leverage user insights to optimize email automation together with our brand marketing teams Report results back to the main stakeholdersSupport the Head of CRM with implementing our CRM strategy by working on topics like tracking database management personalization and setting up new push channels Requirements Do you have this At least 2 years of hands on experience with CRM and email marketing in an e commerce environmentYou are customer centric and you have great ideas on how to best create engagement reduce churn and drive salesYou have worked with Drip Braze Emarsys or another comparable CRM toolGreat analytical skills excel sheets make you happy and you re able to turn numbers into actionYou have great stakeholder management skillsYou are a native German speaker You speak at least C1 level German Bonus points If You have technical knowledge in HTML data and data privacy topics GDPR What Realtainment can offer you An innovative fast growing company with significant investments A 1200 sqm office space with a feel good factor A platform to bring out the creative and fun side in you by participating in our awesome events like ArtNight PlantNight BakeNight and ShakeNight Open minded and ambitious colleagues who are looking forward to taking off with you and celebrating success at exuberant team events We have an authentic feedback culture constructive and open which always focuses on promoting your personal development and growth Did we spark your interest to join a challenge in an ambitious creative and fast growing company Then apply now with your detailed application entertainment factor and where everyone learns something new More than 80 employees and a network of over 600 workshop leaders give their best every day to build Europe s leading platform for creative experiences As a team we attach great importance to being ourselves and to doing exactly what drives us every day To further revolutionize the way people get together We build teams that challenge the status quo grow as a unit and bring the importance of interpersonal relationships alongside with our unique products We live with diversity and equal opportunities In our teams we welcome every applicant regardless of gender ethnic origin religion age sexual identity disability or other grounds of discrimination Personal formulations in the job advertisement are to be considered gender neutral

column3: Senior Partnerships Manager
column11: Job descriptionPlease do not apply for this role if you are not physically located in Europe Africa or the Middle East UTC 1 to UTC 3 While this is a remote position we can not consider candidates that are not based in these regions You can find a detailed explanation in our Recruitment FAQs The world is undergoing a radical transformation Work commerce and even education is moving online Hotjar is at the core of that transformation Hotjar wants to make the web a better place We believe many digital experiences whether on desktop or mobile quite frankly suck and we re working to change that We help by building product experience insights software for product teams We re focused on helping our customers really understand what their end users are doing on their websites to help them find those parts of their sites that are hard to navigate just plain broken confusing or simply not enjoyable In short we show what end users feel strongly about so that product teams can deliver real value fast Hotjar has a team of over 200 Hotjarians spread across 33 countries we re a fully distributed company and always have been What better way to make sure that digital experiences improve than to be online ourselves all day everyday Are you ready to help us build the future Reporting to our Director of Sales we re looking for someone who is excited by the opportunity to create a referral Partner Program almost from scratch To do that successfully you ll need to be both creative and practical you can develop a strategic vision of where and how we will develop the Partner Program one minute send an outreach email the next and jump on a co selling opportunity following that More info on our fledgling partner program can be found here You will Develop the strategic vision for the Partner Program in line with Hotjar s overall business objectivesBuild out and manage the Hotjar Partner Program to increase revenue for both partners and HotjarManage relationships with key exec stakeholders and Hotjar partners to ensure business objectives are alignedIdentify new opportunities to expand Hotjar s business growth through the Partner ProgramEnable Hotjar Partners with content training and incentives to drive long term success Requirements You have previously built a Partner Program that both the Partners and your company loveYou have a proven track record of delivering customer growth through Partner ProgramsYou are data driven and make decisions on the basis of dataYou can work effectively across marketing sales and product teamsYou are practical and come with a simple strategy for how we can work with an MVP partner program proving out its impact step by step Compensation Range The compensation range for this role is 65 000 to 95 000 annually This was established after performing market research and is aligned with our approach to compensation We encourage all candidates to read our Recruitment FAQs to further understand our approach to compensation and how we structure our contracts In addition to the monetary compensation we provide all team members with an assortment of unique and popular perks chosen to reflect our values and ideals be it encouraging constant learning with our Personal Development Budget a great work life balance with the annual leave and Holiday Budget or a happy healthy team with our Wellbeing Budget Hotjar pledges to be a harassment free and discrimination free company committed to equal opportunity We believe people from different backgrounds with different identities and experiences make our product and our company better

column3: Senior CRM Audience Manager m f x
column11: The role At HelloFresh our mission is to change the way people eat forever From our 2011 founding in Europe s vibrant tech hub Berlin we ve become the global market leader in the meal kit sector and inspire millions of energised home cooks across the globe every week As Senior CRM Audience Manager you will join the CRM team dedicated to developing customer centric strategies in order to activate customers through CRM channels You will work closely with cross functional stakeholders to garner a comprehensive understanding of prospect HelloFresh customers and devise a robust global strategy which still adheres to the nuances of our local markets in order to create a seamless customer experience and maximize business value Above all we are looking for people who will make HelloFresh better We believe there are many different ways of developing skills and we love diverse experiences So even if you don t tick all the boxes but think you d thrive in this role we would really like to learn more about you What You ll Do The successful candidate will report directly into the Director Reactivation Task and responsibilities will include Development and continual optimisation of the strategic Reactivation roadmap in partnership with Snr Reactivation Audience ManagerScope and lead the implementation of new Reactivation channelsScope and develop data driven marketing solutions in order to achieve ambitious business objectivesOwnership and development of rigorous AB testing strategies across all international marketsEnabling close partnership and alignment with relevant product teamsConducting in depth performance analysis in partnership with Marketing Analytics teamDeveloping a deep understanding of our cancelled customer base sharing these insights with the wider Marketing and Product teams and using these insights to steer marketing strategyLead personalisation strategies across all Reactivation initiativesSupport Campaign Management team with campaign implementation process from kick off to post mortem analysis What You ll Bring 4 years CRM experience ideally within a subscription model businessIdeally experience with retention reactivation programmesAnalytical curiosity a history of data interpretation and the ability to problem solveCross departmental stakeholder managementAbility to work autonomously in a fast moving fast growth environmentStrong written oral communication skillsProficient in English other languages are a plus What We Offer Comprehensive relocation assistance to move to Berlin plus visa application supportHealthy discount on weekly HelloFresh boxesAnnual learning and development budget to attend conferences or purchase educational resources plus access to the HelloFresh AcademyA diverse and vibrant international environment of 70 different nationalitiesAdditional perks include Free crash course in German compensation for advanced external German classes discounts for our neighboring gym Urban Sports Club summer winter parties discount on our HelloFresh GO vending machinesThe chance to have a significant impact on one of the fastest growing technology companies in Europe in an exciting growth phase About HelloFresh HelloFresh is on a mission to change the way people eat forever Since our 2011 founding in Europe s vibrant tech hub Berlin we ve become the world s leading meal kit provider delivering to over 4 2 million households worldwide in 15 countries across 3 continents Our best in class marketers play vital roles in connecting HelloFresh with new and existing customers across the world Based in Berlin the data driven and creative Global Marketing Team pioneers industry leading research business insight CRM growth marketing and brand communication The team continuously drives our brand forward through experimentation and an entrepreneurial spirit Our more than 15 000 employees from over 70 nationalities are the heart and soul of our diverse fast paced and dynamic environment where innovation and smart fast action is encouraged We will encourage you to make an immediate impact in your area of work as well as empower you to grow your career with us Are you up for the challenge Please submit your complete application below including your salary expectations and earliest starting date After submitting an application our team will review this and get back to you within 5 business days We are HelloFresh At HelloFresh we embrace and welcome diversity and we currently employ over 15 000 individuals globally who contribute to this We employ individuals based on their ability to perform a job rather than on the basis of their race national origin color caste social origin or position gender gender expression sexual orientation religion age disability political opinion marital status or any other characteristic We encourage everyone to apply and will give everyone equal consideration We are an equal opportunity employer everyone is welcome at our table

largest digital companies BBG creates builds buys and scales consumer brands globally Our scalable infrastructure and profitable commercial model is driving hyper growth last year reporting 2020 revenues of 334M Our products are sold across channels including direct to consumer e commerce online marketplaces including Amazon and wholesale to retailers and distributors Our passion lies in kitchen appliances garden living sports and HiFi Our largest and best known brands are Klarstein auna blumfeldt and Capital Sports These are just a few examples within our portfolio of over 23 consumer product brands that is rapidly expanding as we welcome new brands to the group We distribute over 3 700 products to consumers in 28 countries worldwide BBG is now over 1 000 employees strong working in locations spanning the globe from Europe UK USA to Asia Our global headquarters are in Berlin Germany and we are now rapidly expanding our business We are scaling up and investing in world class logistics and fulfilment innovative digital marketing e commerce marketplace development and other sales channels To fuel this growth we are looking for talented and motivated colleagues like you to join us in shaping the DNA of BBG Your responsibilities You manage and optimize multiple paid advertising accounts across several marketing platforms and brands You analyze and measure the success of various advertising campaigns as well as the performance in general You ensure to reach defined target goals and control the marketing budget within your accounts and channels You help us with expanding our marketing activities to new marketing platforms You help us with testing and rolling out of new advertising formats and processes across all our paid advertising channels You will column3: Marketing Manager Demand Generation f m d
column11: Our Company What if your work would empower change in an industry that essentially impacts the prosperity of the entire world Forto is in business to exactly do that disrupt logistics Simplifying global trade has been our mission from day one Our exponentially growing team of more than 550 technology and logistics experts forge ahead each day with the goal to deliver a highly transparent frictionless and sustainable digital supply chain Our company is headquartered in Berlin Germany and currently has in total 12 offices across Europe and Asia including Copenhagen Hamburg Ho Chi Minh City Singapore Hong Kong and Shanghai Leading manufacturers and e commerce brands are among the 2 500 customers using Forto s digitally focused offerings as part of their supply chain delivery Among the fastest growing logistic start ups in Europe Forto s recent investment round June 2021 placed the company valuation at more than 1 2 billion At our core we are in love with progress and cannot cope with the standstill We leave old paths and look for new roads We are constantly striving for ways to be even better tomorrow We are facilitators we are explorers we are visionaries If you are looking for something extraordinary to work for join the crew to become a part of our pioneer expedition Your role As part of the Enterprise Marketing team you will be responsible for identifying customer acquisition channels as well as the preparation execution and monitoring of our B2B demand generation initiatives In close collaboration with the marketing growth and sales teams you will bring our customer acquisition marketing strategy to the next level You will Develop our demand generation marketing strategy and identify new lead gen channels drive existing ones forward and expand our strategy to support our growing international customer baseOwn operate and optimize Forto s customer acquisition campaigns and build multi channel marketing campaigns and initiatives to drive our pipelineCoordinate these initiatives with other parts of the marketing team product marketing digital and performance marketing operations brandMonitor and adjust the success of your initiatives to reach our acquisition targetsPartner with sales and business development to create streamlined lead journeys and setup internal follow up processesDrive optimizations through testing of funnel setups ad copies and segmentations What You Bring 5 years of experience in demand generation marketing field marketing or digital marketing roles in a dynamic B2B environmentYou feel comfortable working across different marketing vehicles and media offline and online to deliver multi channel marketing campaignsYour logical thinking mind loves to create a multifaceted strategy for customer acquisition based on insights from several sources and understanding of sales funnels lead conversions and buyer journeysAs an action oriented team player you have excellent verbal and written communication skills to manage and inspire multiple stakeholdersYour tech savvy talent and creative mind with a strong ability to deeply build content that resonates with customersExperience working with a variety of marketing tools from marketing automation analytics webinar and other digital marketing toolsFluency in German and English additional languages a plus Why Us You can look forward to Personal Professional Development Through strong ownership from the first day you will experience a steep learning curve grow on a professional level and take the next steps to being an Expert or People Lead Impact We are leading the digital transformation of a whole industry and share a high awareness for environmental issues on all levels especially supported by our management Team Join a team of over 30 nationalities and different backgrounds from Tech Logistics Business and more What really matters to us is a caring and welcoming environment where we embrace uniqueness and celebrate diversity Working culture Experience a company culture where we work on eye level decisions are made quickly and knowledge sharing as well as mentoring is on our daily agenda Culture Check out our video to see what it is like to work at Forto formerly FreightHub https www youtube com watch v g4A7kaUaN4w At Forto we don t just accept differences we celebrate them support them and cultivate them to the benefit of our employees products and our communities Forto is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer

column3: Paid Marketing Specialist m f d
column11: Berlin Brands Group BBG has been designing producing and selling products in the home living consumer electronics sound light and sports categories since 2005 and is now one of Europe s largest digital companies BBG creates builds buys and scales consumer brands globally Our scalable infrastructure and profitable commercial model is driving hyper growth last year reporting 2020 revenues of 334M Our products are sold across channels including direct to consumer e commerce online marketplaces including Amazon and wholesale to retailers and distributors Our passion lies in kitchen appliances garden living sports and HiFi Our largest and best known brands are Klarstein auna blumfeldt and Capital Sports These are just a few examples within our portfolio of over 23 consumer product brands that is rapidly expanding as we welcome new brands to the group We distribute over 3 700 products to consumers in 28 countries worldwide BBG is now over 1 000 employees strong working in locations spanning the globe from Europe UK USA to Asia Our global headquarters are in Berlin Germany and we are now rapidly expanding our business We are scaling up and investing in world class logistics and fulfilment innovative digital marketing e commerce marketplace development and other sales channels To fuel this growth we are looking for talented and motivated colleagues like you to join us in shaping the DNA of BBG Your responsibilities You manage and optimize multiple paid advertising accounts across several marketing platforms and brands You analyze and measure the success of various advertising campaigns as well as the performance in general You ensure to reach defined target goals and control the marketing budget within your accounts and channels You help us with expanding our marketing activities to new marketing platforms You help us with testing and rolling out of new advertising formats and processes across all our paid advertising channels You will work with us across several brands with different business attributes customer profiles brand attributes and go to market strategies Your profile You have a good degree in marketing business administration or a similar education You have experience in paid campaign management on either Google or Amazon ideally within an eCommerce or agency environment You are completely confident with Excel basic programming knowledge in JavaScript or Python is a plus You are task driven and initiative taking within a dynamic atmosphere You have exceptional organization skills You are fluent in English We offer An international marketing team that welcomes you and your ideas Flexible working hours and a modern office in the heart of Berlin Spittelmarkt Company benefits such as public transport ticket grant 30 discount on products from our own shop and employer s contribution to the company pension plan Daily fresh fruits and vegetables as well as drinks and various health offers physiotherapy yoga and back training courses Opportunities for professional development language courses as well as team training and coaching An international and dynamic working environment we celebrate success together at numerous company events JOIN THE GANG Become a member of one of Europe s leading ecommerce companies and fill out the online application below We are looking forward to your application Berlin Brands Group Wallstr 16 10179 Berlin www berlin brands group com

column3: Marketing Social Media Internship Praktikum m w d at Sister
column11: Sister is a Berlin based jewellery and ceramics brand Our products are made in Cyprus by local craftspeople in small batches Each piece carries a story relating to Cyprus our Mediterranean way of life and rich history We are in search of a motivated and creative individual interested in fashion social media e commerce and brand building to support our small team over the next few months You will work side to side with the brand owner getting hands on experience in all aspects of the business learning how to go from creation to finished product to market Tasks Areas of work will mainly focus on Social Media Marketing creating content in the style of our brand identity posts stories reels scheduling it in our Social Media accountscopywriting using our tone of voicecreating email newslettersFurther defining what the brand is through mood boards defining our values tone of voice visuals and corporate identityCreating campaign ideas executing them with our photographer translating this into an online campaign At times you may also be asked to help with operations Logistics picking packing shippingInventory keepingKeeping our small warehouse tidyMaking jewelleryAuditing our website and other sales channels to make the purchasing process smooth accurate and optimised Requirements You are a student and you love fashion social media and creating content have a hands on mentality and are proactivespeak both English and German are responsible and independent in time planning Benefits Flexible working hoursPleasant friendly working atmosphere Room for further development in the direction that interests youEmployee discount We are looking for someone to start ASAP If you are interested in getting to know us more please send your CV and a few sentences about you and your experience

column11: foodpanda Delivery Hero Germany GmbH is on an ambitious mission curating and delivering Germany s best neighbourhood restaurants stores and groceries right to the door We re changing the neighbourhoods like never before We wouldn t be able to do this without an amazing network of passionate partners dedicated logistic suppliers and driven employees from across the globe We re looking to hire our first team mates to join our founding team as we kick off our journey to become Germany s first choice for delivery Delivery Hero Germany GmbH is part of the Delivery Hero Group a global leader in the food delivery industry processing over 663 million orders in Q1 2021 and operating in around 50 markets in the world with 29 000 employees and approximately 700 000 riders globally We re column11: Description Embrace the challenge and accelerate your growth with Amazon s International Public Policy and government Affairs Team The public policy community relations manager will join a growing and dynamic team that works across Europe Middle East Africa India and Asia Pacific in support of Amazon s global consumer retail business Like our business interests our policy issues are broad forward thinking and driven by what is best for our customers The International Public Policy team works with a wide range of national local and supranational policymakers industry organizations and non governmental organizations across policy issues spanning the consumer and commercial environment At Amazon we care strongly about the communities in which we operate and where our employees live and work We are seeking a Community Relations Manager to join the Public Policy team to help us build and sustain strong relationships locally and regionally The ideal candidate will have experience in building and fostering relationships with municipalities regional government officials community leaders local business leaders and associations and citizens The Community Relations Manager will collaborate closely with internal stakeholders including site leaders Public Relations HR Public Policy and Amazon In The Community teams in Germany and internationally The role will be based in Berlin Responsibilities For This Position Include Developing and owning a community engagement strategy to develop and sustain strong business and community relationships Developing and coordinating outreach programs to engage with municipalities with regional officials citizens community leaders industry associations and business organizations Serving as the primary interface with local government officials and authorities business leaders and community representatives Developing dynamic and dialogue oriented communication processes with members of the community Initiating and building networks with associations municipal and scientific organizations businesses and non governmental organizations Supporting Amazon leaders to communicate the company s vision and priorities within the community and engaging with community leaders Attending local events and activities engaging in local public speaking engagements participating on local boards and committees to represent the company and build strong relationships with community members Basic Qualifications Bachelor s degree or higher Minimum of 10 years of experience working in public affairs government relations public relations non profit organizations community affairs employee relations or related field Proven track record of building and fostering relationships with internal stakeholders and external partner organizations Written and spoken proficiency in German and English Preferred Qualifications Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to work well in a team and within highly matrixed complex organizational structures An entrepreneurial spirit including the ability to work independently and autonomously Comfortable in dealing with ambiguity and resourceful in problem solving Comfortable speaking to a wide variety of audiences including civic association or regional business groups Ability to manage sensitive or controversial situations and discussions with divergent views Maintain the highest personal level of ethical conduct confidentiality and integrity Excellent organizational communications and writing skills Strong project management skills Attention to detail orientation protected veteran status disability age or other legally protected status Company Amazon EU SARL Germany Branch Job ID A1581604

aufzubauen arbeiten wir jeden Tag für ein außergewöhnliches Umfeld voll unbegrenzter Möglichkeiten Umgeben von großartigen Kollegen und Kolleginnen wirst Du nicht nur mit einem Weltklasse Team lernen und wachsen sondern auch einen Ort für diejenigen aufbauen die ihr Geld für sich arbeiten lassen wollen DAS TEAM Im Marketing Team formen wir eine Marke die für die Demokratisierung von Wohlstand steht Wir steigern das Bewusstsein für unsere Mission indem wir die besten kreativen Talente mit den datengetriebensten Marketeers zusammenbringen Wir sind das Gesicht für unser Wachstum DEINE AUFGABEN Du gestaltest unsere Product PR Strategie maßgeblich mit und stärkst dadurch Trade Republic s Reputation im deutschsprachigen RaumDu bringst fundamentales Verständnis über Trade Republic s Produktangebot mit und vertrittst dieses gekonnt nach außen um eine effektive Umsetzung unserer Markenstrategie gewährleisten zu könnenDu koordinierst in enger Zusammenarbeit mit den Kampagnen und Product Managern die Kommunikation von Produktneuheiten beispielsweise durch Erstellung von Kernbotschaften Pressemitteilungen und PressemappenDu hast signifikanten Einfluss auf die Wahrnehmung von Trade Republic durch die MedienweltDu hast jederzeit den umfassenden Überblick über die Berichterstattung zu Trade Republic dem Markt und den Wettbewerbern und somit Insights unsere eigene PR Strategie zielgerichtet mitzugestaltenDu koordinierst und briefst Interviews mit dem Gründer und Management Team DEIN PROFIL Du bringst mindestens 3 Jahre relevante Berufserfahrung mit idealerweise aus einer top tier PR Kommunikations Agentur oder dem Finanzressort einer führenden VerlagsgruppeDu hast einen akademischen Hintergrund vorzugsweise in Medienwissenschaften und oder KommunikationswissenschaftenDu hast ein tiefes Bewusstsein für die Wirkung von PR Aktivitäten auf andere Marketingkanäle und weißt diesen Einfluss zu nutzenDu bist ein hervorragender Kommunikator und Dir fällt es leicht neue Beziehungen zu Journalisten und Influencern aufzubauenDu hast bereits journalistische Erfahrung im Finanzwesen gesammelt und bringst ein solides Know how in der Content Erstellung mit gegebenenfalls als Copywriter oder Content CreatorDu hast fundierte Kenntnisse in der FinTech Szene und ferner in der FinanzszeneDu überzeugst mit Deiner analytischen Denkweise und Deiner vielseitigen KreativitätDu identifizierst Dich stark mit Trade Republic und bringst ein ausgeprägtes Produktverständnis mitDu sprichst Deutsch auf Muttersprache und Englisch fließend WARUM DU DICH JETZT BEWERBEN SOLLTEST Bei Trade Republic wirst Du die beste Zeit Deiner Karriere erleben Wir sind ein Ort für all diejenigen die außergewöhnlich gut sind in dem was sie tun Unser Motto ist es die Messlatte höher zu legen und wir erwarten von unseren MitarbeiterInnen jeden Tag das Beste Dabei geben Dir unser People First Ansatz und unsere klar definierten Karrierewege die Möglichkeit Dich sowohl beruflich als auch persönlich weiterzuentwickeln Wir sind der Ort an dem sich Dein Job und Deine Karriere mit Deiner Leidenschaften kreuzen Trage Deinen Teil dazu bei eine der größten Herausforderungen unserer Zeit zu meistern das Schließen der Pension Gap und die Demokratisierung des Wohlstands Wenn Dich das begeistert so wie es uns alle bei Trade Republic jeden Tag begeistert dann bewirb Dich jetzt Trade Republic embraces diversity and equal opportunity in a serious way We are committed to building a team that represents a variety of backgrounds perspectives and skills The more inclusive we are the better our work will be

column3: Marketing Allrounder all genders
column11: VRxs is a SaaS Solution for eCommerce businesses to showcase products in 3D and Augmented Reality We change the way customers experience products online Our platform helps any online shop to showcase their products in 3D and Augmented Reality in no time Due to our company s recent growth we are currently looking for marketing allrounders f m x to help our company and brand grow Tasks Support in building a technological brand from scratch Coordinate and support the creation and further development of the VRxs website landingpages and web contentsIndependent creation of digital publications infographics Social Media posts guides etc Requirements Completed studies or training in the field of media design graphic design or a comparable qualificationProfessional experience in agencies and or companies in the field of marketingOrganizational talent reliability and ability to work independentlyExperienced with InDesign Illustrator PhotoshopVery good knowledge of MS OfficeVery good German and English skills both written and spoken Benefits You will be part of an ambitious and growing start up with exciting and industry leading customers In a small team with very flat hierarchies you will be appreciated for contributing your ideas and encouraged to think outside the box Since we are a remote first company you will be able to work from anywhere in the world Should you prefer to work in an office environment you can either work in our office in Hamburg or in our upcoming office in Berlin We are happy to get to know you Please send a short application and your CV to Mario Rudhart

column3: Online Marketing Manager SEA m f d
column11: To strengthen our international team in Berlin we are offering a full time position as Online Marketing Manager SEA m f d Retailers face unique challenges and we support them with technology led solutions Crealytics is a customer centric organization We have strong relationships with some of the world s biggest eCommerce players including Land s End Footlocker and Urban Outfitters Our Digital Marketing teams are key to this They manage vast PPC budgets test new features achieve exemplary campaign performance and ensure clients exceed their business goals Whether you re a Junior Digital Marketer or Team Lead you ll receive regular skills workshops and mentoring sessions Willing to play a big part in our future We d love to hear from you Join a team of over 150 employees in our Berlin London and New York City offices Your Responsibilities You set up and continuously optimize our client s PPC campaigns using varied bid management strategiesYou counsel our clients PPC Managers on how to grow strongly with paid search and Google Shopping using our softwareTogether with your Team Lead you define campaign strategies and deliver plans that exceed our client s expectations You maintain a deep understanding of client business goals and marketing objectives translating them into digital strategiesYou identify growth niches within the assigned projects and markets to ensure that performance goals are metYou work with our specialized semantic software and actively contribute to its development by providing regular feedback Your profile You have relevant experience in online marketing and have gained extensive knowledge of Google AdWordsYou have very good Excel skills and analytical abilities as well as a affinity for numbers and innovative technologiesYou enjoy having direct contact with clients and you impress with a clear and appreciative style of communicationYou are keen to take responsibility and you have a highly self motivated and assertive personalityYou speak English fluently other languages such as German are a big plusIdeally you are experienced in working with Bing Yandex or Baidu What We Offer Appraisal Interviews In your regular appraisal interviews you ll learn more about your strengths explore areas of growth and discuss your career development Be up to date Discover the latest trends by attending one of our meet ups with industry experts from other leading market players or learn from our shared conference experiences Company Socials We re all about combining work and fun Every year we get the whole company together for a company festival to discuss strategy over barbecue and beer Development plan At Crealytics you ll never stop learning which is why we offer an elaborate professional development plan Follow our set career programs or adapt them to your individual career goals Dogs allowed Don t leave poor Fido at home Our office is dog friendly Feedback culture You have an idea for how we can improve Share it in our annual employee surveys or in your end of year one on ones Fitness A healthy mind starts with a healthy body We offer our employees a selection of partnerships with fitness studios and sports memberships Flexible working hours Not a morning person Want to be home when your kids get off school We understand Flexible working hours allow you to pursue a work life balance that suits your needs Food and drinks Craving vitamins or caffeine Just stop by our kitchen and grab some fresh fruit a nice cup of cappuccino or enjoy a relaxing beer after work Game rooms Need a quick break Head over to the game room and challenge one of your fellow Crealytees to a set of table tennis a game of foosball or try your luck on our video game console Headhunting bonus Inspire your friends family neighbors or the people you meet in a park and get up to 3000 if we hire a new Crealytee referred by you International environment Not from around here Neither are most of us We ve got employees from over 40 countries helping us run international campaigns all over the world International opportunities Internationalize your career If you find a Crealytics job in another country we ll help you move there Language courses Want to brush up on your language skills Give one of our free language classes a try Lunch roulette This is a fantastic opportunity to get in touch with all your colleagues Everyone interested will be randomly sorted into small groups to go out for lunch together Onboarding mentorship From day one you ll be assigned your very own mentor They will act as your guide answering all your questions as you settle into life at Crealytics Orientation week Get off to a great start The Crealytics orientation week is an excellent opportunity to learn more about Crealytics explore our products and meet the management team Pension scheme In addition to the statutory pension scheme we offer you a non binding retirement plan for your specific situation subsidized by Crealytics of course Relocation Paid accommodation as well as experienced relocation buddies guide you through your visa application Teambuilding Bond with your team mates with an activity you ll all enjoy Each team gets a yearly incentive budget to do whatever they want Training We offer more than 60 wide ranging internal and external trainings and workshops Improve existing skills or learn something entirely new Transparency You deserve to know how we re doing as a company Join our quarterly meetings and strategy sessions to find out about current business figures product updates and the company roadmap Join our team and become part of our success story

column3: SDR Manager DACH Benelux Nordics
column11: Aircall is on a mission to revolutionize the business phone industry We exist to empower every professional to have richer conversations We provide an entirely cloud based voice solution which seamlessly integrates with popular productivity and helpdesk tools We have raised more than 220 million since 2015 and our base of 8000 customers and growing is at our forefront Behind our product are the amazing teams driving it split between Paris New York Sydney Madrid London Berlin and remote locations Despite our distance we all work together to drive our product As a Manager of Sales Development for DACH BeNeLux and Nordics you ll develop train and hire highly driven and enthusiastic SDRs The Sales Development team is the first interaction prospective customers have with Aircall and is key to the success of business as a whole We are looking for a highly empathetic and passionate leader with a winning mentality and infectious positive attitude Your experience in consultative sales means you can spot training opportunities through listening to calls and examining emails cadences You should have a good knowledge of the whole sales cycle at a SaaS company within DACH and or Benelux and or the Nordics Your mission Aircall Hire coach and manage a team of Sales Development RepsDevelop the sales product and industry skills of each team memberWeekly 1 2 1 meetings using dashboards to track SDR pipelines activity and performanceDay to day monitoring of activity and performance utilising your knowledge of the individual internal and external factors and a data driven approachMotivate team members through creative incentivesRegularly report on Team Individual ResultsIdentify and make recommendations for improvement in the areas of process efficiency and productivity A little more about you Native or Fluent English SpeakerNative or fluent German Dutch Danish Norwegian or Swedish speaker2 years in the software sales space as both an SDR closer within DACH Benelux and or Nordics marketsConsistent track record of 100 of quota achievement as an individual contributorExperience leading a team as a Manager Team Lead or Senior repExperience managing and improving Sales Development KPIs We know that success comes from smart work and deserves to be recognized and rewarded We value people who are bold ambitious collaborative and customer centric We re a global community growing together If you love a good challenge enjoy solving meaningful problems and want to be a part of one of the fastest growing B2B startups then Aircall is the company you are looking for Aircall offers a unique work environment and the chance to collaborate with diverse teammates across continents We ll provide freedom and tools to allow you to thrive at your best and foster an environment you can do it in Why join us Key moment to join Aircall in term of growth and opportunities Our people matter work life balance is important at Aircall Fast learning environment entrepreneurial and strong team spirit 35 Nationalities cosmopolite multi cultural mindset Competitive salary package benefits DE I Statement At Aircall we believe diversity equity and inclusion irrespective of origins identity background and orientations are core to our Aircall journey We promote active inclusion to foster a strong sense of belonging which is one of our main strengths as a business We strive to assemble diverse people that can enrich and learn from each other We pledge to make sure everyone not only has a seat at the table but is valued at the table providing equal opportunities to develop and thrive We will constantly challenge ourselves to make sure that we live up to our ambitions around diversity equity and inclusion and keep this conversation open because we realize that we have work to do and much to learn

column3: Marketing Intern m f d
column11: Company Description We are Flink your online supermarket revolutionising the way you do your grocery shopping With a wide selection of over 2 400 high quality products we aim to deliver to your door in just 10 minutes We put our customers first and ensure all products delivered are fresh and nutritious In addition to this we are able customise our national assortment to be able to offer you unique local products in every city Our delivery hubs are located in densely populated inner city locations and we strive to be sustainable by delivering on electric bikes and using packaging that can be recycled Founded by experienced e commerce professionals and backed by some of the most renowned investors in Europe we are growing rapidly and have a great hunger to continuously challenge ourselves We pride ourselves in being an inclusive and equal opportunities employer with a diverse and multicultural team If you want to be part of this exciting journey read on In your role as a Marketing Intern m f d you will directly contribute to the growth of Flink by attracting people to become riders and pickers through multiple marketing channels paid and organic The mission will be to supply all of our cities with enough riders and pickers so that all our orders can be filled within the promised 10 minute time Job Description Optimise our Landing Page and improve conversion rates by helping us transition to inhouse landing page where the optimisation will continueBe in charge of content management and find out which content works best across all platforms paid media landing pages offlineCommunity management take charge of our social media accounts and be the first point of contact for potential applicantsAssist the rider marketing lead with online paid media channels Facebook Google and Job platforms Qualifications You are currently studying Business Administration Marketing Media Management or similar fieldsYou have excellent written and spoken communication in English and GermanPrevious experience running paid media campaigns Facebook Google YMaster of google excel pivot tables vlookups whatsIFs are all familiar to youYou are creative and data driven at the same time You use data as the basis for your decisionsYou are innovative motivated and result oriented and have a high sense of responsibility Additional Information A cool 20 off your personal Flink orders be the first to test out new products A unique opportunity to be an early bird and have an impact on our strategyA steep learning curve the possibility to work in an energised and dynamic team within a fast paced environmentFlat company structure where taking leadership is encouragedFor Berlin A newly renovated and spacious HQ in the heart of Kreuzberg lots of delicious lunch spots available within short walking distance It is our commitment that every applicant will be evaluated according to their skills regardless of age gender identity ethnicity sexual orientation disability status or religion

column3: Operations and Strategy Manager
column11: About Toptal Toptal is a global network of top freelance talent in business design and technology that enables companies to scale their teams on demand With 100 million in annual revenue and over 40 year over year growth Toptal is the world s largest fully remote company We take the best elements of virtual teams and combine them with a support structure that encourages innovation social interaction and fun We see no borders move at a fast pace and are never afraid to break the mold Position Description The Toptal network includes thousands of top engineers designers finance experts project managers and more from over 100 countries working with leading companies on mission critical projects As the Operations and Strategy Manager at Toptal you will be responsible for building a world class talent supplier network that enables Toptal to grow talent supply to meet rapidly growing demand You will own Toptal s supplier on boarding and performance programs end to end including designing the strategy establishing operating models and processes measuring results and scaling to over a thousand partners in our network You will also lead a team of highly skilled technical recruiters who will support in supplier network growth and skill based recruiting activities As a new function with Executive level visibility we are striving to build a comprehensive supplier strategy that will include identifying and establishing relationships with high potential partners pressure testing capabilities establishing on boarding procedures creating and deploying supplier scorecards and managing overall performance of partners As a part of the Talent Supply team you will work to establish and monitor KPIs to measure effectiveness and scale programs in an ROI positive manner This is a remote position that can be done from anywhere Due to the remote nature of this role we are unable to provide visa sponsorship Resumes and communication must be submitted in English Responsibilities Your objective is to grow the number of talent sourcing partnerships and increase the ability of the partners to scale their own organizations while maintaining high quality talent standards You will define the process for qualifying and on boarding partners This includes working with Product to improve the partner s platform experience and evaluating the partner s ability to scale In addition to growing the breadth and depth of the talent sourcing partner program you will establish scorecards to measure partner performance and work with Talent Success to implement partner development programs This includes building strong relationships with points of contact creating a feedback loop for both sides to provide input on the other s performance and providing transparency to partners on our demand trends Another important objective is related to the balance of supply and demand Certain talent skills are in higher demand than others within the Toptal network You will utilize our internal supply modeling and forecast tools to develop a buffer strategy to prevent talent shortages for the high demand skills while also avoiding on boarding too many talents if a shortage of opportunities exists for talent with a specific skill set You will leverage the talent partner program as well as technical recruiters to establish the buffers and maintain a healthy pipeline Additional Responsibilities Include but Are Not Limited To In coordination with the Product team develop the platform experience for talent sourcing partners Use KPIs to prove impact and scale the program Assist in developing the long term talent supply strategy Improve scale and efficiency of pipeline recruiting techniques Identify and execute on opportunities to improve our services by gathering talent feedback analyzing data to identify trends and communicating findings to various audiences and partnering cross functionally with key leaders and teams In The First Week Expect To Onboard and integrate into Toptal Learn about the core of the Toptal service by shadowing calls with clients and Talent Learn the structures and capabilities of the Talent facing teams at Toptal with a particular focus on understanding the goals processes and ongoing projects within the Talent Operations and Talent Supply teams In The First Month Expect To Learn how to use the supply modeling and forecasting tools to assess supply health Learn how the current Talent Sourcing Partner program works Start developing relationships with the already established partners In The First Three Months Expect To Develop a framework for the talent partner performance evaluation Establish a process to identify prioritize and on board new talent sourcing partners Set long term vision on how the talent partner program is expected to contribute to Talent Supply over time Begin building requirements with the product team to update the platform as needed to accommodate the new process changes In The First Six Months Expect To Monitor quality of partners and implement action plans to improve quality where needed Provide data to partners to ensure transparency around our demand forecasts Grow the number of talent in partnerships to be a large percentage of overall talent activations In The First Year Expect To Build a team of strong performers to partner with you on the growth of the Talent Sourcing Partner program at scale Have sufficient talent supply available from talent partners to be able to staff large teams within 24 hours Requirements 3 years experience in a management consulting or engineering role preferably with experience leading and developing teams Strong understanding of SQL Experience implementing supplier development programs and or supplier scorecard management is a plus Strong bias towards hands on action and learning through rapid experimentation Demonstrated ability to solve difficult problems through first principles reasoning Ability to thrive in ambiguous environments by making initial assumptions and revising strategy as new information becomes available Communication Our clients are global our Talent community is global and our core team is global Good communication is at the core of everything we do and you must be a strong communicator able to speak to a wide range of stakeholders and team members across a wide range of geographies Strong knowledge of the consulting professional services and or Talent space is preferred Prior work in a technical environment with direct exposure to software engineering and an understanding of underlying concepts i e code review unit testing code documentation is an added bonus You need to be open to giving and receiving challenging feedback You must be a world class individual contributor to thrive at Toptal You will not be here just to tell other people what to do For Toptal Use Only west midwest ussouth northeast canada europe talentops
