column3: Digital Marketing Manager DE m f d
column11: We at DCMN work closely with each other in cross functional teams and support the growth of our clients from different industries from mobility and fashion to sustainability and entertainment As we grow very fast we are looking for highly motivated people who are ready to rock with us If you are looking for a starting point to grow into a digital marketing expert please keep reading We are excited to hear from you You will be working in English and German fluency required How you will make an impact You design and implement performance oriented online marketing campaigns through various channels SEA classic display RTB retargeting video social and mobile for DCMN and for all our markets The Netherlands United Kingdom United States South Africa India and of course Germany You ll become part of our in house Leads Team and help DCMN become the preferred growth marketing partner among stakeholders around the globe You collaborate with different inhouse teams and manage various internal external stakeholders along the campaign management process You continuously analyse campaign results optimise ongoing campaigns based on your findings and create reports that reflect campaign success as well as improvement points You make decisions based on data and strive to become better and better at what you do You stay up to date with new opportunities and become the go to Online Marketing expert for the team Skills you will need to be successful Working experience in Digital Marketing either for an agency or in house We d love it if you are already familiar with marketing digital brands and or start ups You know all relevant Online Marketing Channels and how they can interact to drive a digital brand s growth You know your way around the typical online marketing tools e g Facebook Ads Manager Google Ads DSPs and Adservers You have very strong analytical skills and are not afraid of working with Excel You have a performance driven mindset with an column3: Senior Voice Of Customer Specialist VOC
column11: The VoC Voice of the Customer function sits withing the CARE Continuous Improvement teams and is responsible for identifying communicating and escalating issues that negatively impact the customer s overall experience with Vistaprint The role we re looking to fill will work globally and will serve as an important pillar of their assigned LOB Line of Business The incumbent will define the scale and impact of customer issues streamline communication to relevant teams and monitor progress through to resolution This position is also directly responsible for providing input to stakeholders relevant to any changes that are customer facing including but not limited to product launches overall product offering services and site updates In this position you would also maintain a backlog of issues related to the LOB along with the business or customer impact for these items to enable the LOBs or other stakeholders to prioritize improvements in a structured manner The Sr VoC Specialist serves as an expert of the Vistaprint and Promotional Products brand s and its product offerings You would represent the voice of the customer to drive continuous improvement of the overall customer experience In this position you would interact primarily with the CARE operational teams Customer Experience DnA Product Marketing Pricing Taxes and Logistics as needed for locales supported in one of our international contact center sites BER MNL MBY TUN VEN Main Responsibilities Manage a continuous cycle of feedback solicitation issue prioritization and resolution communication in collaboration with Operations teamsUse customer feedback and Voice of Customer insights to appropriately escalate findings in response to defined business goalsCreate clear and compelling service enhancement stories that drive action with relevant teams to improve the overall customer experience with our siteServe as the assurance expert for defined locales by reviewing test experiences and providing specific feedback back to the teamsMaintain strong collaborative relationships with key stakeholders Social Media Problem Management CE CRM Logistics Marketing and Pricing teamsLeverage existing feedback loops to provide relevant stakeholders with real time customer reaction to large scale site changes and or testsCollaborate with Analytics as needed to facilitate data capture and input to VoC presentationsEnsure quality and consistency of all supporting data sources when championing an initiativeEngage cross functional partners during the design implementation and analysis of VoC data and creation of dashboards and reportsMaintain a VoC project plan of initiatives for their assigned LOBServe as the communication gatekeeper for local teams providing closed loop feedback for issues identified by the center this includes providing context and recommendations based on unique market considerations especially when the issues cannot be resolvedMinimal Travel may be required Essential QUALIFICATIONS A truly customer centric mindset and the unreserved desire to inspire customer loyalty and to deliver service excellenceBachelor s Degree preferably a business or communications related major or similar educational backgroundExcellent verbal and written communicatorAdvanced knowledge of Microsoft Excel and PowerPointTeam player with strong collaborative skills who is open to new approaches Inquisitive approach to work and seeks to understand the why Proven ability to work independently and deliver results or complete projects results within defined timeframesAbility to handle difficult situations problem solve and find creative resolutionsStrong desire to continuously improve processes and servicesFluency in English is mandatory spanish knowledge is desirableProficiency in one or more languages where required in the assigned Line of Business e g spanish Desirable Proficiency in Vistaprint products services and processesPrevious experience analyzing consumer behavior feedback NPS or CSAT in an ecommerce capacity desiredProficiency with survey tools such as QualtricsExcellent project management skills detail oriented Self motivated and thoroughExperience with Lean or Six Sigma a plusAdvanced knowledge of Microsoft Excel and PowerPointPrior experience with social media and or digital platforms a plus We are looking forward to receiving your application Equal Opportunity Employer Vistaprint a Cimpress company is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer All qualified candidates will receive consideration for column3: Industry Digital Strategist Financial Services m w d
column11: Microsoft is a company where passionate innovators come to collaborate envision what can be and take their careers to places they simply couldn t reach anywhere else This is a world of more possibility more innovation more openness and more sky s the limit thinking a cloud enabled world Our mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more We aspire to build the experiences and tools that make it possible for every professional in any business or role to be much more productive We re fueling digital transformation in order to make a difference in people s lives and in organizations across the globe We are insatiably curious and always learning We lean into uncertainty take risks and learn quickly from our mistakes We build on each other s ideas and collaborate across boundaries to bring the best of Microsoft to our customers because we are better together It s our ability to work together that makes our dreams believable and achievable Together we make a difference We are motivated every day to bring digital transformation to our customers We help them empower their employees engage their customers optimize their operations and change the very nature of their products services and business models We are customer obsessed we love learning about our customers and then developing solutions that meet their needs Responsibilities Are you ready to seize an opportunity to work with Microsoft most established financial customers advising and supporting their C level executives to envision new business ambitions to invest in co innovation programs and to plan how to best succeed together maximizing the business value supported by digital technologies If so the Industry Digital Strategist position is a unique career opportunity for you For decades banks insurances and capital market institutions have invested in technology to incrementally innovate and become more profitable In the Digital Era financial institutions use technology to transform how they interact with customers what they sell how their employees work and make decisions how they optimize their operations and transform their products and business models Digital transformation requires a cultural shift and Microsoft Industry Digital Strategist get organizations started on their digital journey They help financial institutions to reimagine and transform customer engagements employee experiences business models and operations Industry Digital Strategist brings their individual expertise as well as Microsoft resources experience and innovation to empower organizations to reach their digital aspirations Partnering with banks insurances and capital market institutions Industry Digital Strategist drive a program of change to build the digital business As an Industry Digital Strategist you will guide these organizations to create an aspirational plan that formalizes their digital vision Your will develop trusted relationships with business leaders to help them think about their business and customers in the context of digital possibilities and collaborate on a vision to achieve more Primary Responsibilities Help create financial institutions digital business strategy You guide customers as they re imagine and document their digital transformation journey Be the trusted C level advisor and go to person on digital transformation for the world s largest financial institutions Lead the Dream Team You lead the creation and orchestration of a digital transformation unit that includes the Microsoft and customer team to help make it happen Enable Continuous Innovation You ensure that the organization creates an ongoing capability that will continue the digital transformation process throughout the company Qualifications Experience Required Education Key Experiences Skills and Knowledge Our Industry Digital Strategist know their customer s business the financial services industry in which they operate and how Microsoft can help them drive their Digital transformation The broad scope of responsibility of this role requires a solid capability in business development see and structure the deal consulting put steps in place to get to the deal sales sell the deal In addition this role requires strong leadership and people skills The Industry Digital Strategists share a common set of characteristics and bring the experience that will drive innovation and customer value leveraging the following 10 years of professional experience in a leading strategy consultancy Recognized innovator with strong storytelling abilities to inspire growth mindset for the teams and the customers Business development experience of structuring negotiating and supporting complex deals both at customer and internally Quantitative business skills ability to quantify and assess business opportunities and to prioritize them for building a customer value plan Executive presence including ability to hold CXO level discussions and executive level exceptional interpersonal verbal written and presentation skills Broad understanding of the financial services industry including current and emerging Digital Solutions and experience managing large scale business change programs within one or more vertical industries i e banking capital markets or insurance Team orchestration building and leadership experience Ability to attract coordinate and drive forward large interdisciplinary internal external teams to drive forward outcomes and MVPs in he benefit of customers Travel is an integral expectation of this position as the needs of our customers and our business demand WCB EC Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age ancestry color family or medical care leave gender identity or expression genetic information marital status medical condition national origin physical or mental disability political affiliation protected veteran status race religion sex including pregnancy sexual orientation or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws regulations and ordinances We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories consistent with legal requirements If you need assistance and or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the column11: About Moyyn Moyyn is AI based reverse job platform for engineers developers technicians and highly skilled professionals Once you apply to the platform you will be matched with several job offers from our clients and also get recommendations for various job offers If the clients find your profile interesting they will get in touch with you directly for interviews Apply once to the talent pool and get interviews from many companies directly We are recruiting candidates for this particular job as a recruiter for one of our partner platforms Why we need you The marketing manager at our firm internally pioneers in building our brand initiating marketing activities around it with the ultimate goal of leveraging our growth in Finland Norway Denmark and Sweden Your mission Be the figurehead in the development of our brand and its implementation inside and especially outside the companyOwn and deliver creative and wild brand marketing ideas followed by effective planning and execution resulting in tractionHelp building an infrastructure on which a team can grow and prosper on an international scaleKeep an eye on the growth impact as user growth is our mid term KPIWork closely with other marketing and growth teams design performance marketing external communication product development and community Your profile Experience in a marketing department a marketing agency 3 years Relevant experience in brand marketing is a must with a proven track record of marketing activitiesProficient organizational skills enabling proactive management of all brand activitiesConceptualization and case modelling for forecasting growth impactAdvanced knowledge of brand managementFluent in English is a must office language

column11: We are CARIAD an automotive software company and part of the Volkswagen Group Our mission is to make the automotive experience safer more sustainable more comfortable more digital and more fun Soon we ll be a team of more than 5 000 software developers and engineers building the leading tech stack for the automotive industry and creating a unified software platform for over 10 million new vehicles per year We re looking for talented digital minds like you to help us create code that moves the world Together with you we ll build outstanding digital experiences and products for all Volkswagen Group brands that will transform mobility Join us as we shape the future of the car and everyone around it YOUR TEAM CARIAD is ramping up its communication team that is in charge of internal and external communication affairs Our division has the aim to communicate fast transparently and innovatively These goals come along with the approach of close and agile collaboration within our young venture Although we are a fast growing company within the Volkswagen Group we want to remain as much of the start up mentality as possible CARIAD communication is addressing a large variety of stakeholders including communication divisions of Volkswagen Group and its brands What You Will Do Establishing content strategies across all communication teams consistent with our brand image that addresses both our international business goals and communication needsDeveloping clear and engaging content ideas and formats that create brand awareness with and serve information needs of our target audiencesPerforming analysis and competition benchmarks to determine what type of content is missing and what is neededConsulting with content owners producers and editors to help direct their work towards our strategic communication goalsDeveloping comprehensive communication campaigns across the different communication teams that achieve awareness in respective marketsOverviewing adjusting and managing the editorial calendar for digital communications across all owned channels and being an essential and vivid member of our newsroom teamEstablishing content guardrails in collaboration with the team that ensure consistency in our tone of voice and visual storytelling and make CARIAD content quickly identifiable Who You Are Degree from an accredited University with focus on journalism or communicationProfessional experience of at least 5 years in communications on corporate or agency sideExcellent written and spoken German and English skillsStrong passion for great content and thinking out of the box to present complicated topics in an understandable and catching wayProven content strategy and project management experience strong analytical skillsPassion a team player NICE TO KNOW 35 hour weeksRemote mobile workCompany pension planAnnual professional development

column3: Junior PR Manager
column11: MORE TOMORROW NOW Grover s vision is for more people to get the best out of life with flexible affordable access to the tech they want Our monthly tech rental subscription model is a more sustainable way to use tech as part of the circular economy Grover is growing Fast In 5 years we ve gone from a small startup based in a Berlin apartment to a team of 200 people offering flexible tech rental across Germany Austria Spain and The Netherlands And we re just getting started This year we re expanding into even more countries and launching even more innovative ways for people to access tech for them to get more tomorrow now Tomorrow s tech lets us achieve extraordinary things to experience deeper work smarter play harder and live better So if you want to join us on our mission to get tech into more people s hands in a simple smart sustainable way we d love to have you on the team We are looking for a Junior PR Manager to join our talented Brand team As Junior PR Manager you will Work closely with the PR Communication Lead Senior PR Manager wider Brand Marketing team including our Social Media teamMaintain a keen awareness and understanding of industry trends affecting our target groups and use your expertise to deliver appropriate recommendations regarding the communication strategy surrounding themContribute and work alongside an existing communications plan and use your skills to further develop a long term successful editorial planParticipate in the development planning and execution of multichannel communication concepts campaignsBuild and expand long term relationships with influencers key stakeholders and new press contactsSupport our multiple PR agencies in their daily tasks and respond effectively to all media enquiries and interview requests to include internal handling with relevant spokespersons or departments Support on event planning and execution of trade events Create trend related communication angles press books press pitchesMonitor analyse and communicate PR results on a regular basis You care about Ownership you easily communicate ideas implement them and take responsibility for your actionsHelping others sharing knowledge with your colleagues is on top of your prioritiesFast paced startups you love adapting to different situations and you know how and when to iterate fast and with high qualityOur product you believe in our vision and are willing to give your best to build the future of Grover We are looking for a passionate Junior PR Manager with 1 2 years of experience in a Junior PR Manager role or in brand communication or marketing environment at a Startup Creative Agency or Consumer Brand Experienced in the areas of PR marketing events social media digital communicationsFluent in German and English skills Tech innovation mindset and curiosity Affinity for lifestyle tech design topicsAdvanced knowledge of social media platforms and Influencer MarketingFamiliar with the media landscape in Germany as well as with digital media and digital communicationEffective oral and written communication skills with the ability to tailor communication style based on the audienceMultitasking collaboration skills and a hands on mentalityPractical experience with media analytics and measurement toolsTeam oriented motivated creative and responsible personality who can structure himself herself What we offer Competitive salary and benefits Flexible working hours combined with a semi remote work structure Office Remote Figure out the balance that works best for you Entrepreneurial responsibilities and upward career growth Engaging open office located in central Berlin Diverse global team of 50 nationalities and counting Genuinely the nicest group of colleagues who will soon become friends Team events Grover tech discounts and expanding perks

column3: Senior Brand Manager Brand Entrepreneur M A m f d
column11: Berlin Brands Group BBG has been designing producing and selling products in the home living consumer electronics sound light and sports categories since 2005 and is now one of Europe s largest digital companies BBG creates builds buys and scales consumer brands globally Our scalable infrastructure and profitable commercial model is driving hyper growth last year reporting 2020 revenues of 334M Our products are sold across channels including direct to consumer e commerce online marketplaces including Amazon and wholesale to retailers and distributors Our passion lies in kitchen appliances garden living sports and HiFi Our largest and best known brands are Klarstein auna blumfeldt and Capital Sports These are just a few examples within our portfolio of over 23 consumer product brands that is rapidly expanding as we welcome new brands to the group We distribute over 3 700 products to consumers in 28 countries worldwide BBG is now over 1 000 employees strong working in locations spanning the globe from Europe UK USA to Asia Our global headquarters are in Berlin Germany and we are now rapidly expanding our business We are scaling up and investing in world class logistics and fulfilment innovative digital marketing e commerce marketplace development and other sales channels To fuel this growth we are looking for talented and motivated colleagues like you to join us in shaping the DNA of BBG About Our M A Team We are on a mission to become Europe s largest digital direct to consumer brand builder Having successfully built multiple well known brands with substantial market share at rapid growth rates inhouse we are now elevating our growth to the next level by acquiring and scaling established winning brands By leveraging our global e commerce infrastructure we are in a prime position to become Europe s top acquirer of digital natives brands Tasks This role offers an exceptional opportunity to shape BBG s strategically highly relevant Post Merger Integration Department You will take ownership of a portfolio of acquired brands with all their respective products for all channels developing a detailed understanding for success factors for each brand and how to improve it It will be your responsibility to maximize international market success with existing and new products in close cooperation with multiple departments Your responsibilities You lead a team of highly skilled and strongly motivated brand managers You analyze brand and product level data on different sales channels like Amazon web shops other marketplaces to understand and improve product performance You develop and execute strategies to ensure successful positioning in search ranks on different channels including monitoring metrics understanding market trends and competition pricing strategies ensuring stock availability building reporting structures and more You develop strategies to increase sales and optimize cost identify profitable and unprofitable products improve conversion rates manage PPC campaigns coupons and deals rework content in alignment with our content team and more You actively shape the process of launching new products aligning launch measure across relevant departments ensuring on time launches optimizing time to market etc You generate and automate regular reportings daily weekly monthly in alignment with our BI team You continuously analyze the e commerce landscape and proactively suggest improvements for steering our business You actively support and optimize the onboarding process of newly acquired brands to ensure a seamless integration You cooperate with stakeholders from multiple departments across the company Category Management Channel Management Marketing Purchasing Shop Management BI Product Management Requirements Your profile You have 4 years of experience in Product Management Marketing or an analytical function preferably at a startup or similar fast paced environment You have 3 years of experience in e commerce preferably working within the Amazon ecosystem You are a highly analytical self starter who can manage multiple projects and figure out complex problems without a lot of oversight You bring an entrepreneurial mindset and the ability to dig through data draw conclusions and make recommendations You are highly proficient in Excel experience with Power BI is a plus You can handle aggressive deadlines and prioritize work in a fast paced often ambiguous environment with fire drills coming up on a near daily basis You bring a can do attitude reliability transparency and enjoy cross functional work You are an excellent communicator with a high level of organization and impeccable attention to detail Benefits We offer Challenging projects with plenty of entrepreneurial freedom in one of Europe s leading e commerce companiesFlexible working hours and a modern office in the heart of Berlin Spittelmarkt Company benefits such as public transport ticket grant 30 discount on products from our own shop and employer s contribution to the company pension planDaily fresh fruits and vegetables as well as drinks and various health offers physiotherapy yoga and back training courses Opportunities for professional development language courses as well as team training and coaching

column3: Senior Manager eCommerce Experience Architect all genders
column11: CX is no longer enough It s time to reimagine business through the lens of experience The emphasis on experience is arguably at its greatest today because the structure of almost everything we do how and what people buy how and where they work and how they interact with others has been upended by world events in 2020 The consumer behavior shifts we re seeing today are not a blip They are likely to stay with us for a long time some likely forever Some have been in motion for years and many have been accelerated by the COVID 19 pandemic This new reality forces businesses to look deeply at how people are experiencing their brands Good CX has become mainstream leading to a sea of sameness Companies that deliver an experience with the entirety of their business are more likely to achieve the highest levels of sustained growth Accenture Interactive is the new kind of partner for a new kind of client Our mission is to drive sustainable growth for clients We leverage our platforms skills tools creativity technology systems and services to meaningful Experiences that live at the intersection of purpose and innovation for our clients and their customers Standing on the shoulders of Accenture we can team this with Board level business credibility and unparalleled creative spirit and technological might We are looking for someone who is able to define the best customer experiences that differentiate their clients drawing on all of Accenture Interactive s amazing capabilities and wider Accenture services so enabling their clients to deliver these experiences sustainably and at scale In our team you will learn How to draw together all aspects of what creates world class experience to create truly transformative change end to end and all within a single organisation To team your expertise in creating impactful experiences with our internal marketing advisory marketing operations business design and world class technology teams To draw experience from innovative and transformational work across the globe and across industries and apply it within your context to reimagine what experience means for the next ten years As a Senior Manager Experience Architect eCommerce you will Develop relationships with key experience focused C level client executives and deeply understand their unique challenges Originate and react to opportunities that will address the client s experience agenda in tandem with the Accenture account leadership Be part of our client leadership teams representing the Experience agenda including support for account planning and building maintaining relationships with key Experience delivery ecosystem partners Lead experience change programs helping to define the value proposition and bring the best of Interactive to help address client s experience needs collaborating with the rest of Accenture Understand and apply relevant offerings from across the Accenture Interactive pillars Design Experience Build Experience Communicate Experience and Run Experience and help orchestrate into accounts Mobilize teams from different pillars agencies to work together for complex cross pillar deals Support the management of the pipeline of opportunities across the portfolio working with wider industry teams in Accenture

der kleinen Unternehmen SMB und Start ups in Deutschland vorantreibt In dieser verantwortungsvollen Position sind Sie für die Marketingstrategie und umsetzung für unseren KMU Markt in der DACH Region verantwortlich Sie arbeiten mit Vertriebs und Marketingteams zusammen um den Bekanntheitsgrad von Zendesk zu erhöhen und das Neugeschäft im SMB Segment zu fördern Wenn Sie Teil eines wachstumsstarken Unternehmens in Deutschland sein wollen und eine Leidenschaft für den Aufbau und das Wachstum von Unternehmen haben sind Sie bei uns richtig Ihre Aufgaben Sie sind die Stimme von SMB Start ups in den Vertrauen schaffenÜberwachen bewerten und berichten Sie über die Leistung von Marketingkampagnen und geben Sie auf der Grundlage der Analyse der Ergebnisse strategische Anweisungen und Leitlinien Ihre Qualifikationen Mindestens 6 Jahre Marketingerfahrung besser sind 10 Jahre davon mindestens 2 Jahre mit Fokus auf SMB Marketing und den deutschen Markt Saas Marketing Erfahrung d h Verständnis dafür vertriebsunterstützte Käufer Entwicklung Aufbau Überwachung Optimierung und Pflege von KampagnenErfahrung in der Zusammenarbeit mit mehreren internen Teams und Abteilungen Aufbau effektiver Beziehungen und Beeinflussung von Veränderungen Frühere Erfahrungen in der engen Zusammenarbeit mit dem Vertrieb und dem regionalen MarketingHervorragende Fähigkeiten in den Bereichen gruppenübergreifende Zusammenarbeit zwischenmenschliche Kommunikation mündliche und schriftliche Ausdrucksfähigkeit Problemlösungsfähigkeit und Präsentationsfähigkeit sind erforderlichFließende Deutschkenntnisse und Wohnsitz in Berlin Über Zendesk Champions des KundenserviceZendesk hat 2007 die Revolution der Kundenerfahrung eingeleitet indem es jedem Unternehmen auf der ganzen Welt die Möglichkeit gab seinen Kundenservice online anzubieten Heute ist Zendesk der Champion für großartigen Kundenservice überall und für jeden und ermöglicht Milliarden von Konversationen indem es mehr als 100 000 Logos mit Hunderten von Millionen von Kunden über Telefonie Chat E Mail Messaging soziale Kanäle Communities Bewertungsseiten und Help Center verbindet Zendesk Produkte werden mit Liebe entwickelt um geliebt zu werden Das Unternehmen wurde in Kopenhagen Dänemark gegründet in Kalifornien aufgebaut und weiterentwickelt in New York City an die Börse gebracht und beschäftigt heute mehr als 5 000 Mitarbeiter in aller Welt Erfahren Sie mehr unter www zendesk com

column3: Content Operations Specialist Intellectual Property
column11: The Role Team Our global operations team supports the diverse range of artists on the Redbubble marketplace through maintaining Content and Community guidelines enforcing our IP Publicity Rights Policy and resolving artist concerns We work closely with policy leads in key areas of the business to help protect the rights of our artists and uphold the integrity of the marketplace We re looking for a superstar to join the Content Operations team as our new Content Operations Specialist in Intellectual Property You will work closely with subject matter experts in all things Content on Redbubble and take a great deal of pride in knowing you have a hand in keeping the bad stuff off the site What you ll do Review user generated content against established guidelines Collaborate with internal subject matter experts on various policiesHandle inquiries related to intellectual property mattersSend timely clear and concise written notifications to artists and others What you bring Relevant professional experienceCritical thinking skills with the ability to make independent decisionsAwareness of a wide variety of American and global pop cultureA high level of discretion with confidential mattersLaser focused attention to detail especially under pressureAn easy going attitude that will not get offended by the nature of this role which may include potential exposure to adult material and other interesting contentHuge bonus points if you re fluent in Spanish German or French About Redbubble Redbubble is a marketplace of over one million independent artists from all base salary plus a chance to own part of the RB business via equity grantsCommuter Benefits Monthly wellness rebate 100 gift code for our site upon starting and 30 off thereafterApple equipmentAnd column11: Want to be a Hero Join one of the leading global online food ordering and delivery marketplaces We are looking for a Senior Director of Consumer Insights f m d to join the brand team and help drive research and data initiatives As a leader of our Consumer Insights team our mission is to enable evidence based decision making in our organization We achieve this by gaining a deep understanding of market dynamics and establishing trustworthy and impactful metrics to track competition and our brands plan for improvements and strategy changes We seek to impact the strategy and direction of Delivery Hero s consumer experience and to provide day to day input on company marketing and product decisions big and small Your team will use mixed methods to study and understand user behaviour evaluate potential of new initiatives guide plans and generate ideas The goal is to advise every decision we make with just the right relevant evidence metrics insights and data Your Mission Lead a team of researchers setting focus strategy and priorities to maximise influence and impactExtract data points demographics attitudes perceptions and experiences from research to tell us about column3: Marketing Analyst Controller f m x
column11: Job Description Our pioneering team of marketing experts uses data driven insights to run efficient performance marketing and improve the customer journey We operate all acquisition marketing and conversion optimization activities fully in house giving you the best environment for a steep learning curve As a Marketing Analyst Controller f m x within the Marketing Team at AUTO1 Group you will use your analytical skills to plan and control the marketing budget allocation You support business decisions with in depth analysis proactive improvement suggestions and continuously advance the reporting system What You Will Tackle Analyze the marketing performance of countries brands and different channels in order to generate insightful reports to lean decision makingCollaborate strongly with Online and Offline Marketing teams to enable an as efficient as possible budget allocationBuild sophisticated reports for Marketing Management and give your recommendations for actionsConsolidate marketing acquisition data and provide in depth insights to our Business Analytics and Finance teamWork on complex analysis e g cross media checks long term development of the business as well as ad hoc analysis based on specific needs on short notice What You Are Good At At least 2 years of relevant work experience in marketing controlling performance marketing or similar Mathematical or statistical background with a strong analytical understanding as well as advanced Excel skills Tableau would be a plusStrong ability to proactively translate data insights into business actionsHighly motivated to grow further within a fast paced environment and learn in the field of performance marketing by challenging status quo constantlyExcellent coordination skills that enable you to drive projects with different teams across the organization with fluent communication skills in English Why AUTO1 Group Once a unicorn now a listed public company be part of our success story Our dynamic startup environment offers new challenges for personal growth with the contribution of own ideas We offer you a secure job with a permanent contractWe care during COVID 19 you get the choice to either work from home or at the office where we provide you with a safe hygienic environmentLife work balance is part of our culture you will receive 30 days of vacation and can work from home up to 5 days a week Apply by uploading your CV with a note of your salary expectations Contact Joanna Sinicka email protected AUTO1 Group is Europe s leading digital automotive platform As a dynamic tech company we are revolutionizing the automotive industry with our brands wirkaufendeinauto de AUTO1 com and Autohero Our strong team of 4 200 people is dedicated to making Europe wide car trading and transport as fast and stress free as possible for our customers Grow personally and shape the future of car trading with us At AUTO1 Group we live an open culture believe in direct communication and value diversity We welcome every applicant regardless of gender ethnic origin religion age sexual identity disability or any other non merit factor

column3: Senior Business Development Associate
column11: Hi we re Fever Fever is the leading global entertainment discovery platform and has revolutionised the world of entertainment since 2015 inspiring over 45 million people every month to discover the best experiences in their cities Fever empowers event organizers to create amazing experiences with successful examples such as the Candlelight Concert Series attended by over 1 million guests the Los Angeles based Stranger Things The Drive Into Experience or the Mad Hatter G T Party in multiple cities across the world Fever is an international company with a team of over 350 people currently present in more than 80 cities with offices in New York Los Angeles Chicago London Paris Madrid and Barcelona and is backed by leading institutional investors including Rakuten Capital Accel Fidelity and Atresmedia among others What do we do Fever s marketplace is composed of events and experiences hosted by organizers that we provide visibility to via our marketplace and media network However given that Fever and our Secret Media Network provide us with millions of data points and insights around how people consume offline entertainment we are now able to go one step further in the value chain and create our own Fever Originals experiences similar to how Netflix has begun to create their own shows We believe there is a huge opportunity to create more of our own content and continue to provide an amazing content offering to our users About You At least 4 years of experience in Sales experience in the area of e commerce events or media and advertising are a plus An entrepreneurial can do attitude you get things done period A data driven approach to decision making About the Role Lead and grow the Fever team in BerlinIdentify in tandem with Ops the right partners to join the Fever marketplace and the Secret Media NetworkCollaborate with our Marketing and Media teams to ensure city growthPropel all team members to achieve and exceed monthly targetsHire and train new team membersCoach current team members to ensure best in class performance BENEFITS Attractive compensation package consisting of base salary and the potential to earn a significant bonus for top performance Stock options are possible Opportunity to have a real impact in a high growth global category leader40 discount on all Fever events and experiencesWork in a location in the heart of Madrid with possible travel across our marketsHome office friendlyResponsibility from day one and professional and personal growthGreat work environment with a young international team of talented people to work with

column3: Publisher Manager DACH
column11: An exciting opportunity exists in the newly merged OneFootball and Dugout organization to develop and grow our reach of football fans by onboarding new publishers broadcasters and platform partners across the DACH region You will be expected to identify pitch and win new publisher partners as well as manage and service an existing portfolio of partners in the market The role will require a strong commercial and consultative approach including educating the market on the OneFootball proposition and creating appropriate solutions to publisher needs It is an exciting opportunity at an exciting time in Football and OneFootball will be at the forefront of many of these developments Your Role Build a relevant go to market strategy aligned to the wider company goals and objectives Including identifying and prioritizing opportunities based on clear qualification criteria Negotiate close opportunities and ensure the smooth onboarding process Tailor pitch documentation to each individual opportunity based on thorough research and analysis Accurately document all activity in the company CRM Salesforce to report and manage deal flow Ability to become a trusted industry expert across football content video player tech user data Be aware of local compliance and regulatory rules across data and content Meet and exceed quarterly annual supply targets determined by the business Be highly service orientated for managing both external and internal stakeholders Develop strong internal relationships with our sales clubs content editorial social legal and marketing teams to maximize supply opportunities Represent OneFootball at relevant events when required Your Profile Native German language excellent English skills written and verbal Successful track record in business development Meeting and exceeding targetsPersuasive approach and ability to work at pace Deep knowledge of the German publisher content landscape An established network of industry contacts at either or publisher broadcasters or platforms A strong understanding of the media industry focused on digital data and media sales processes Understanding of Programmatic ecosystem Comfortable presenting up to C suite level clients in both commercial and editorial departments Displays an ambitious entrepreneurial and proactive mindset A team player and also a proactive self starterComfortable working in a fast paced environment with ability to manage multiple work streamsOutstanding communication and interpersonal skills Knowledge of Salesforce or other similar CRMComfortable adopting and working with new technology CMS DMP Reporting tools You can find our Data Privacy Policy for recruiting here

column3: Head of Marketing Designer Fashion Store Categories w m d
column11: The Head of Designer Fashion Store Category Marketing drives the overall Marketing strategy to execute Designer Sports and Streetwear initiatives across our 23 Markets As we expand further into new Markets you will be focussed on delivering the best and most efficient plans to get Zalando to the position of The Starting Point for Fashion locally and building the Designer Sports and Streetwear businesses from the ground up You are doing so in collaborating strongly with our local Market and Category teams the Designer team the Sports Streetwear team and the Global Marketing team amongst others You will lead and coordinate driving continuous learning efficiency and innovation This role will drive thought leadership on campaign strategies audience segmentation data driven plans and will apply industry leading thinking to deliver optimal program and business performance WHERE YOUR EXPERTISE IS NEEDED Collaborate cross functionally with relevant stakeholders and key teams to develop the Annual Designer Sports and Streetwear Marketing Plan Partner with Market leads and Regional Marketing in developing key strategic approaches for the business Oversee the annual brand and marketing plan and bring it to life in coordinating our efforts and investments in large media campaigns social and digital activations PR influencers onsite content direct marketing etc Drive the execution of our Zalando Designer Sports and Streetwear campaigns and communications with operational excellence and relentless pursuit of performance Consistently deliver and drive new ideas and initiatives to improve commercial performance Work collaboratively across functions such as Markets Analytics Regional Marketing Social Media Marketing Digital Experience to build strategies to improve the effectiveness of multichannel media programs Enable holistic cross channel strategies and activation plans of our communications ensure highest standards are met and that business execution remains best in class WHAT WE RE LOOKING FOR 12 years of progressive levels of responsibility in marketing management planning leadership brand management Ideally you have been in a product or brand leadership role for a consumer digital brand Luxury brands experience is required Business analytical mind Proven track record in developing and executing marketing strategies and expertise in reaching and engaging user audience segments through a targeted strategy Passionate about analysis results and efficiency Experienced in applying latest insights data analysis and KPIs to sharpen content and media strategies to drive reach engagement and conversion Strong leadership marketing expertise You are able and familiar to manage multiple stakeholders effectively locally and globally You are a great leader and team player capable of bringing a larger audience with you on the strategic journey you will create You are getting things done in a fast paced ongoingly changing environment You are a highly reliable business partner passionate about your work and able to choose the right battles You embrace and drive change and are always on the hunt for solutions and improvements Strong communicator You have excellent English skills and are able to communicate clearly with various stakeholders able to bring people with you and to drive alignment PERKS AT WORK A workplace run on trust empowerment and feedback positive inspiring working atmosphere Competitive salary employee share shop 40 Zalando shopping discount discounts from external partners centrally located offices public transport discounts municipality services great IT equipment flexible working times additional holidays and volunteering time off free beverages and fruits diverse sports and health offerings Mentoring and personal development opportunities and an international team of experts Relocation assistance for internationals PME family service and parent child rooms We celebrate diversity and are committed to building teams that represent a variety of backgrounds perspectives and skills All employment is decided on the basis of qualifications merit and business need About Zalando Zalando is Europe s leading online platform for fashion connecting customers brands and partners across 20 markets We drive digital solutions for fashion logistics advertising and research bringing head to toe fashion to more than 42 million active customers through diverse skill sets interests and languages our teams choose to use Please note that all applications must be completed using the online form we do not accept applications via email

column3: Senior Creative Director Prime Video Europe m w d
column11: Description Come build the future of entertainment with us Are you interested in shaping the future of movies and television Do you want to define the next generation of how and what Amazon customers are watching Prime Video is a premium streaming service that offers customers a vast collection of TV shows and movies all with the ease of finding what they love to watch in one place We offer customers thousands of popular movies and TV shows from Originals and Exclusive content to exciting live sports events We also offer our members the opportunity to subscribe to add on channels which they can cancel at anytime and to rent or buy new release movies and TV box sets on the Prime Video Store Prime Video is a fast paced growth business available in over 240 countries and territories worldwide The team works in a dynamic environment where innovating on behalf of our customers is at the heart of everything we do If this sounds exciting to you please read on We re looking for a super innovative passionate creative who thrives in a fast paced highly ambiguous environment to join the Prime Video Europe team You must be a curious and open minded creative that has created and launched multiple integrated 360 campaigns across print television video online outdoor experiential and social media preferably at a global level The Senior Creative Director will infuse inspiration and creative thinking across our European Marketing Organization Requirements Develop innovative marketing experiences that helps tell meaningful stories which connect to customers Helping us drive awareness and viewership of Amazon Prime Video Have a strong creative vision with a clear concise ability to provide direction to internal and external partners Think across platforms and channels mastering the idiosyncrasies of each and create tailored content across each channel Elevate and help inspire the creative output of our internal and external partners creative agency and production partners to ensure campaigns meet a high level of creativity and innovation Effectively direct and manage the development of multiple creative assets from key art to trailers across multiple creative disciplines Please apply in English For This Role We Require BASIC QUALIFICATIONS Proven global creative experience that encompasses 360 marketing campaigns covering digital interactive marketing and brand design A strong portfolio of work showing creative invention with the ability to articulate big and breakthrough ideas across disciplines Deep knowledge of design and associated tools and principals Bachelor s degree or equivalent experience Further Qualifications Would Be a Plus PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS Entertainment industry experience Strong verbal and written communication skills Experience in managing creative teams A good understanding of digital products and interactive entertainment Multi lingual ideally German French Italian and or Spanish speaker Proven ability to multi task and problem solve working in a fast paced environment and maintain a super sharp attention to detail Commitment to upholding high standards with impeccable attention to detail Amazon is an equal opportunities employer We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success We make recruiting decisions based on objective criteria including your experience and skills We value your passion to discover invent simplify and build Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon Consult our Privacy Notice to know more about how we collect use and transfer the personal data of our candidates Company Amazon Digital Germany GmbH Job ID A1370404

column3: Performance Marketing Manager m f d
column11: We are a B2B SaaS company with an ambitious mission Making it easy for everyone to use their data productively To achieve this we build a no code business intelligence platform that is easy to use and endlessly scalable y42 was founded in 2020 and today already compiles a team of 42 data witches and wizards software magicians as well as business geeks from 15 nationalities We are backed by international top tier investors that deeply believe in our vision of frictionless business intelligence About the Growth team In this role you will be part of our Growth team directly reporting to the Team Lead Growth Marketing We recently left the evangelizing phase and are building repeatable predictable growth which you will significantly build As our Performance Marketing Manager you will Identify new cross channel inbound opportunities to help accelerate our growth ambitionsSupport the Outbound team with reaching their SQL goals and help skyrocket us to unicorn statusTake full ownership of your campaigns from A to Z planning ad copy creation testing optimization monitoring and make them predictable with regards to MQL generationIncrease the number of MQLs in our existing channels while keeping or even lowering target CPMQLsVerify the effectiveness of new channels and formats to generate predictable lead pipelinesDevelop cross functional projects with other teams Customer Success Content Growth etc or external partnersBe responsible for a significant share of our monthly ad spendMake sure that cooperation with external partners works smoothly and eventually replace them in our key markets DE UK US A successful Performance Marketing Manager will constantly analyze the performance and suggest new optimization strategies proactively You will be perfect for this position you if you Hold a Bachelor s or Master s degree in Marketing Business Administration or similarHave 2 years of professional experience in at least one performance marketing channel further practical knowledge in one additional channel is a plusWorked in a B2B SaaS company beforeAre fluent in English any additional language is a plusAre able to independently work and plan ahead and come up with creative ways to generate high quality MQLsThink problems are actually opportunities to learn from and therefore enjoy creating immediate countermeasures when challenges ariseHave a very analytical mentality paired with a creative mindKnow at least the basics of GTM tracking and analytics in generalBring some kind of data experience to better relate to our target audience s pain or are eager to deep dive into the data analytics spaceAre always up to date about all things Marketing Why should you join y42 The opportunity to significantly shape a VC backed company in its early daysA base salary of 40 50k depending on experience plus equity shares to participate in the company s successWeekly team lunches and regular team eventsA well located modern office with air conditioning and countless food optionsState of the art work equipment incl MacBook Pro monitor and headphones of choicePublic transport passFree fruits snacks and beveragesThe flexibility to work from home or our office y42 is proud to be an equal opportunity employer prohibiting discrimination and harassment of any kind We want to work with the best people no matter how they look dress or speak or whom they love believe in or aspire We are committed to building a team that represents various backgrounds perspectives and skills as we believe diverse teams with complementary skill sets make the strongest teams The typical hiring process at y42 CV application Share your CV with us and any supporting documents if you like We will get back to you as quickly as possible Get to know each other In our first call we want to exchange expectations and clear up your most urging questions Furthermore we want to excite you about our mission and product Main Interview In this interview our hiring managers want to learn more about your skills and thought processes We want to understand your abilities and align on a technical level Culture Interview In the last hiring stage we want you to meet at least one member of the management team We deeply value team chemistry and want to give you the opportunity to get to know each other before any signings Et voilà Offer We aim to finish the entire process within 28 days

platform Implementing cross channel CRM campaigns from segmentation over message creation to the parametrisation and quality assurance of the campaign possible channels include email push notification in app messages SMS printed direct mail Pioneering the deployment of complex new campaign journeys and enabling other team members to rebuild the setup Leading and coordinating the implementation of multi markets CRM campaigns e g taking care of the timely implementation breaking down the project into manageable chunks for other team members Taking full ownership of the campaigns you create and stakeholders from the strategists in the CRM Team over Brand Teams to our Analytics Team What You ll Bring 3 years of experience in CRM especially in the execution of CRM campaignsSQL experience ability to run SQL scriptsSalesforce Marketing Cloud experiencesproject management experiences are a strong pluspassion for CRM and digital mediaattention to detaileagerness to constantly questioning the status quoanalytical and problem solving skillsexcellent organisational skillsability to work in a fast moving fast growth environmentproficient in English other languages are a plus What We Offer Marketing Team pioneers industry leading research business insight CRM growth marketing and brand communication The team continuously drives our brand forward through experimentation and an encouraged We will encourage you to make an immediate impact in your area of work as well as empower you to grow your career with us You can get a taste of what we ve been working on by checking out column11: Want to be a Hero Join one of the leading global online food ordering and delivery marketplaces We are looking for a Google Display and Programmatic Manager f m d to join the Performance Marketing team on our journey to always delivering amazing experiences This role will be primarily focused on supporting our brand foodpanda in the German market Your Mission You will support foodpanda Germany to generate more orders via web and app through media buying on Google products such as App Campaigns TrueView DV360 and more as well as mobile DSPs You will manage and optimize campaigns for acquisition activation and retention across web and app and optimize towards defined KPIs You will heavily support local marketing teams with advertising strategy targeting optimization creative direction etc innovation adoption support with new products and features ad hoc troubleshooting tracking etc You will attend bi weekly calls and prepare monthly KPI reports delivered to key stakeholders You will establish own and streamline various processes with local marketing teams e g creative strategy procurementYou will communicate regularly with account managers and product specialists from Google and others to ensure our marketing goals are met and stay updated about product developments You will work closely with local and central design departments handle creative briefings and ensure creatives are delivered according to our data driven best practices Your Heroic Skills You have at least 5 years of experience in performance marketing You have experience working with Google Display products App Video Display campaigns or Programmatic buying i e DV360 or alternate DSPs You have experience optimizing Google Ads or DV360 campaigns bidding targeting and audience management as well as troubleshooting performance issues You have a good knowledge of the German market key publishers and media groupsYou know how to plan set up and complete A B tests and lift studies with clear applicable results You are passionate about content and creatives that drive impact and have experience working with content for performance branding campaigns You are able to devise and execute a channel strategy throughout all its different phases You have a good operational understanding of tracking and analytical tools GTM Adjust You can manage several projects from start to end across several stakeholders with varying levels of involvement You are a great communicator with a positive attitude to problem solving You are highly proactive well organized analytical and have excellent Excel skills You are fluent in English and German written spoken more languages are a plus You thrive in working in a fast paced environment and are quick to adapt to changes Why with key stakeholders including travelers travel partners media influencers social followers and teamBuild external visibility programs and thought leadership platforms for leadersDrive media relations pitch maintain and develop strong media relationshipsPrepare leaders for media interviews and speaking opportunitiesDemonstrate a solid understanding of social media trends and content strategySupport on issues management and crisis communications in the EMEA regionThink strategically about our brands positioning and potential opportunities in an exciting competitive travel spaceWhile this role will primarily focus on KAYAK and our travel brands including momondo the Director will also support key OpenTable PR moments throughout the year Minimum Experience And Qualifications Degree in Communications Journalism or relevant area of studyProven track record creating and launching best in class PR campaigns10 years of experience in PR communicationsAbility to is the world s leading travel search engine As an employee of KAYAK you will be part of a global network that includes OpenTable and KAYAK s portfolio of metasearch brands including Swoodoo checkfelix momondo Cheapflights Mundi and HotelsCombined Many employees are dedicated to one brand but we all have the benefit of using each others strengths and insights Together we re able to help people column3: Junior Online Marketing Manager Berlin
column11: About The Role DOES DRIVING GROWTH FOR ONE OF THE MOST INNOVATIVE BRANDS IN CONSTRUCTION TECH EXCITE YOU magicplan is one of global leading construction and floor plan apps with over 500 000 downloads per month 4 8 rating in App store and 50 international employees working in offices in Munich Berlin Nantes and Montreal We are looking for a new colleague to join our fast growing company s Marketing team in Berlin office as Junior Online Marketing Manager m w d Where will you work As a new member of our Marketing team which is in charge of positioning and promoting our Sketch Report and Estimate solutions your main tasks include lead generation and product feature communication of our iOS Android app as well as the cloud service Your job responsibilities will include among others Building and orchestrating digital advertising and automated email nurturing campaigns in our martech stack based on the demand funnel frameworkCollaborating with internal teams to build landing pages managing conversion tests and optimizing the user experienceBuilding and maintaining analytics including trends conversion rates and overall performanceWorking with the team for life cycle journeys content and frameworks to enhance prospect progressionConsulting with PPC and SEO team to expand and improve acquisition campaignsExpanding growing and transforming current paid acquisition programsCollaborating cross functionally with marketing team members to hit KPI goals What You ll Do In the first 3 months we ll help you to Learn about the product and its features Get in touch with most of our 50 colleaguesGet familiar with internal processesAdopt company cultureStart working on your first marketing tasks under mentoring of senior colleagues In the next 3 months you should Start taking over individual marketing tasks with support from senior colleaguesCollaborate on tasks with other teamsGet full understanding of stakeholdership and processes By the end of the year we ll make sure you are ready to Work independently on majority of tasksTake own initiative while developing marketing campaignsTake more ownership and responsibility About You You have a master s or bachelor s degree in business administration marketing or similarYou have first professional experience in performance based direct response online marketing on in house marketing teams creative agencies or startups experience in B2B app marketing is beneficial You have a growth mindset always making improvements trying new things rolling with changes failing fast and a can do attitudeYou have a general understanding and experience with marketing automation systems lifecycle marketing tactics user segmentation and other key marketing principlesYou are creative and enjoy digital advertising briefs and assets creationYou have strong interpersonal skills you are easy going and like to work in an informal organizationYou have excellent written and oral communication skills in English German and or French is a plus You are highly organized and self motivated with a high level of initiative Why us Completely flexible working hours and home officeApple equipmentFree drinks coffee fruit snack all over the placePublic transportation ticket or gym membershipYearly personal development budget for courses and educationCompany pension schemeCompany parties minimum twice per year Summer winter Oktoberfest etc Travel visit and work from Montreal or Nantes offices with our colleagues in Canada or FranceAnd one more thing Iceland teambuilding trip real Iceland with geysers and volcanoes Covid 19 prevented us last and this year but all 50 of us will gather in Iceland as soon as we will be able to travel freely and without restrictions Interested We are looking forward to receiving your application About Magicplan magicplan builds mobile and cloud software to capture interior spaces and assist in the planning of construction jobs We re striving to become the go to solution to capture interior spaces with a mobile device By combining Augmented Reality and Artificial Intelligence we facilitate on site data acquisition categorisation and processing magicplan assists in the planning estimating and scheduling of renovation restoration and remodelling jobs We believe in questioning the status quo in the building industry to provide contractors with a better way to get work done while on the go Over 20 million users and major corporations use magicplan and have created the largest floor plan database in the world Over 79 000 projects per week were managed by using magicplan We re proud to be trusted by 5000 businesses We re always looking to hire the best and brightest If you re a flexible problem solver able to think critically on your feet and build the best solution for the context apply today Start with magicplan on our journey to change the work of millions of building and renovation experts around the world So if this role speaks to you we encourage you to apply to our team We look forward to hearing from you magicplan is an equal opportunity employer committed to diversity and fair working practices

product marketing strategy and implement decision frameworks for product communicationDevelop and oversee product communication rolloutsLeading and motivating a team while mentoring junior team members as well as managing key local and central stakeholders What You Can Bring To The Table 8 years of professional experience working in a Brand Management role in a German or multinational online environment with a minimum of 2 3 years of experience in an equivalent senior brand management positionA successful history of developing and executing brand marketing strategies with a data driven approach With experience in growing brands or introducing new brands or products to marketKnowledge of groceries or e commerce space would be idealYou are a problem solver who can define assess solve column3: Senior Growth Product Manager
column11: About Toptal Toptal is a global network of top freelance talent in business design and technology that enables companies to scale their teams on demand With 100 million in annual revenue and over 40 year over year growth Toptal is the world s largest fully remote company We take the best elements of virtual teams and combine them with a support structure that encourages innovation social interaction and fun We see no borders move at a fast pace and are never afraid to break the mold Position Description We are looking for a Senior Growth Product Manager to drive the growth of both our freelance talent network and client base You will partner with our Growth Marketing team and collaborate with teams across the business including Design Engineering Marketing SEO Operations and Product Management to rapidly test and iterate on new features As a Senior Growth Product Manager you will lead a team of Growth Product Managers focused on SMB small and medium sized business Leads Enterprise Leads and Talent Network Growth You will be responsible for shaping product strategies mentoring Growth Product Managers and managing stakeholder relationships to ensure smooth product releases that continue to grow the Toptal business This role will report directly to the Director of Growth Product This role involves a mix of leadership and hands on work You will also be responsible for generating ideas to acquire new leads and seeing them through to demonstrate impact across the business While you may not be involved in the day to day sprint ceremonies you re not afraid to jump in and help out in feature development You are also responsible for ensuring the implementation of the product roadmap driving brainstorming and experimentation and executing the vision We are looking for someone who isn t afraid to present new ideas drive metrics and go after bold initiatives If this sounds like you come join our Growth Product team This is a remote position that can be done from anywhere Due to the remote nature of this role we are unable to provide visa sponsorship Resumes and communication must be submitted in English Responsibilities Lead 3 growth product teams focused on growing our client base and freelance talent network while delivering on our OKRs and driving sustainable growth for Toptal Mentor and shape Growth Product Managers that report to you by providing ongoing product expertise processes and product guidance Continuously formulate and execute a roadmap while working with primary stakeholders your Growth Product Managers and the Director of Growth Product Identify growth opportunities in support of Toptal s growing business Facilitate meetings and workshops that drive collaboration prioritization and improve impact ensuring that good decisions get made Establish effective relationships across a wide range of teams in the business Establish a shared understanding of business priorities and strategy within each of your product teams Conduct high quality and detailed qualitative and quantitative research to evolve and inform the direction of product development In The First Week Expect To Onboard and integrate into Toptal meet the teams and people you will have long term working relationships with Partner with the Director of Product to get a fundamental understanding of the vision strategy teams goals and processes Work closely with your reports focused on freelance talent network growth and client growthExplore the history of the product and team including assets design standards content strategy roadmap and unexplored opportunities that you can lead Independently start to study and learn the Toptal platform and product suite In The First Month Expect To Work alongside the Director of Product on the execution of initiatives ensuring designs meet requirements initiatives are well defined and everything is delivered to specification Start working with each of your Growth Product Managers to gain an understanding of their current product areas goals and metrics we want you to get acquainted with Toptal processes through doing Begin to dive into user behavior using our analytics tools and platforms to provide insight into the Growth team and your squad to inform the product roadmap Identify areas of growth and opportunities for both your product area and your product team In The First Three Months Expect To Take ownership of your team roadmap coordinating with senior leadership and stakeholders where necessary Ensure that your teams are appropriately staffed and are collaborating with engineering design and content strategy when necessary to recruit and onboard more people Contribute ideas and facilitate workshops and discussions for new experiments and initiatives In The First Six Months Expect To Be able to demonstrate a clear measure of your impact through business results your partner relationships and execution excellence In The First Year Expect To Drive significant impact on client and talent network growth Requirements See the list below as a guide We are interested in hearing from intelligent driven people with prior experience in product management Does this sound like you Please apply A BA BS degree preferably with a focus on Business or Marketing 5 years of professional experience in either product management or growth product with solid exposure to product management meaning you have owned multiple products brands or features within your organization 2 years of people leadership experience within the product and or growth scope of work and have experience mentoring junior product managers Outstanding written and verbal communication skills Experience leading design and engineering teams driving the development of high quality pages and digital experiences that effectively accomplish business goals while maintaining brand standards Experience with online growth Lead Acquisition SEO and performance marketing is a plus Intermediate level quantitative analytics skills including at least basic SQL skills A knack for building simple and effective user interfaces and the ability to communicate ideas and direction through mockups and wireframes An understanding of design thinking user research and user testing An extremely sharp eye for detail and a strong sense of what types of creative products will be both effective for growth and representative of the Toptal brand Ability to thrive in rapidly changing environments with a strong willingness and ability to eliminate ambiguity and execute You are the type of person that craves accountability rather than shuns it A demonstrated ability to manage multiple projects at once Be open to receiving feedback and constructive criticism A background in web development or an understanding of core fundamental concepts would be advantageous You must be a world class individual contributor to thrive at Toptal You will not be here just to tell other people what to do For Toptal Use Only natechcities ustech naproductcities canada europe uk individualcontributorEurope PN 1

column3: Social Media Manager Brand builder Plett Internship
column11: This is a 2 month unpaid internship with the option to work 100 remote Plett is the type of brand that every social media manager wishes that they could add to their portfolio and it could be added to yours Think nature shots Think GoPros underwater cameras cliff jumping outdoor workouts endless adventures Think hiking on Table Mountain Think about a brand that digital nomads are hooked on an adventure backpack that s starting to become popular in the US and Europe The person to get it to be really well known could be you A question you should be asking yourself is what kind of adventure travel brand would you be building if you had total creative freedom Grow and manage our Instagram Tiktok accounts for two months to find out Meet Plett an eCommerce brand becoming a real
